item.title: Ninth Birthday Impy
item.beer_description: Imperial 9th Birthday stout dressed up to the nines with hazelnut, chocolate, and caramel biscuits (you know which ones). We're partying like it's 9! Water, Barley (Gluten), Oats, Lactose (Milk), Hops, Yeast Neon Raptor Brewing Co. - Ninth Birthday Impy

item.title: You For Coffee
item.beer_description: On our worldwide beer travels we can almost guarantee seeing our Polish friends Stu Mostow, so this imperial breakfast stout collaboration is long overdue. Rich coffee and sinful chocolate combined will inspire you to go for coffee yourself! Water, Barley (Gluten), Oats, Lactose (Milk), Liquid Cacao, Coffee, Hops, Yeast Neon Raptor Brewing Co. - You For Coffee

item.title: Off the Rack Kentucky Bourbon 2023 By Rackhouse
item.beer_description: Aged for two years in Kentucky bourbon barrels imparting rich, dark, and robust flavors of cacao, vanilla, char and bourbon. With every sip this layered flavor profile makes a distinct mark on the palate from start to finish. A true example of the nuance relationship between wood, bourbon and a rich imperial stout. LERVIG - Off the Rack Kentucky Bourbon 2023 By Rackhouse

item.title: Confection By Rackhouse
item.beer_description: The curated flavors are layered to charm both the sweet tooth and the seasoned palate. Blue raspberry, marshmallow, coconut, and chocolate mingle with a gentle touch of roast coffee, while time spent in rum, bourbon, and maple barrels lends depth with vanilla, maple, and oak. Confection is sweetness elegantly wrapped in the character of the barrels. LERVIG - Confection By Rackhouse

item.title: Night Shift Vintage 2025 / Imperial Pastry Stout Aged In Rum Barrels With Coconut & Chocolate
item.beer_description: We’re continuing our Imperial Pastry Stout series with a very special release. Inspired by the beloved coconut cube, we’ve created a beer that tastes just like it. Aged in rum barrels from Barbados, with coconut flakes and cocoa nibs, this stout captures the classic rum, coconut, and chocolate flavors in every sip. Cheers! HORIZONT Brewing - Night Shift Vintage 2025 / Imperial Pastry Stout Aged In Rum Barrels With Coconut & Chocolate

item.title: Night Shift Vintage 2025 / RIS Aged In Rhum And Vanilla Macadamia Rum Barrels
item.beer_description: A reimagined Russian Imperial Stout aged in both fresh Rhum barrels and Rum barrels previously holding macadamia nuts and vanilla. The result is silky and rich, with nutty-vanilla layers, subtle rum sweetness, and a smooth, creamy finish. HORIZONT Brewing - Night Shift Vintage 2025 / Russian Imperial Stout Aged In Rhum And Vanilla Macadamia Rum Barrels

item.title: Night Shift Vintage 2025 / Double Chocolate Imperial Milk Porter Aged In Bourbon Barrels
item.beer_description: A creamy, sweet, double chocolate porter aged in Bourbon barrels for a rich blend of vanilla and roasted notes. Brewed with loads of cocoa nibs and extra chocolate for full decadence. Lactose adds silky texture and a dessert-like finish – pure liquid chocolate bliss! HORIZONT Brewing - Night Shift Vintage 2025 / Double Chocolate Imperial Milk Porter Aged In Bourbon Barrels

item.title: Night Shift Vintage 2025 / RIS Aged In Bourbon Maple Syrup Barrels With Chocolate & Coffee
item.beer_description: Jet-black, full-bodied Russian Imperial Stout brewed with freshly roasted Costa Rican and Ethiopian coffee and Ghanaian cocoa. Aged in Bourbon and maple syrup ex-Bourbon barrels for deep, sweet-smoky chocolate and coffee complexity - bold, refined, and utterly indulgent. HORIZONT Brewing - Night Shift Vintage 2025 / Russian Imperial Stout Aged In Bourbon Maple Syrup Barrels With Chocolate & Coffee

item.title: Kome Lupulos
item.beer_description: Motueka, Citra & Simcoe. KOM Beer - Kome Lupulos
item.beer_style: IPA - Imperial / Double New England / Hazy

item.title: Twilight Hyperactive
item.beer_description: As is customary for our anniversary, we're brewing Twilight Hyperactive, a Triple IPA that pays tribute to our most iconic beer: Hyperactive. This year, we wanted to capture that magical moment of twilight, when day turns to night, and translate it into an intense and silky smooth beer. Twilight Hyperactive is packed with two hops, Simcoe and Citra, which deliver greater aromatic intensity and a higher alcohol content, while retaining its juicy and enveloping character. Leave it to us through a window of tropical aromas, ripe citrus, and a subtle resinous note. It's creamy on the palate, lively, and balanced in bitterness that retains its power. This is our way of toasting you and celebrating eleven more times together in the sun; at this point between light and darkness, a new cycle begins. As is tradition for our anniversary, we're brewing Twilight Hyperactive, a Triple IPA that pays tribute to our most iconic beer: Hyperactive. This year, we wanted to capture that magical moment of twilight, when daylight gives way to night, and translate it into an intense, silky beer. Twilight Hyperactive is generously enriched with two hops, Simcoe and Citra, which provide greater aromatic intensity and a higher alcohol content, while maintaining its juicy and enveloping character. Let yourself be carried away by a host of tropical aromas, ripe citrus, and a subtle resinous note. On the palate, it's creamy and lively, with a balanced bitterness. Cervesa Espiga - Twilight Hyperactive

item.title: Touch Grass
item.beer_description: A creamy and lush DIPA interpretation of our pale ale Vanity Metrics. Joining NZH-101 and amping up the funk and fruit we have superstars Citra and Nelson Sauvin. Our expressive house yeast brings this all together in a typically 'that's a Verdant beer' kind of way. Verdant Brewing Co - Touch Grass
item.beer_style: IPA - Imperial / Double New England / Hazy

item.title: Unconventional Tactics
item.beer_description: It’s no secret that Nelson Sauvin is our favourite hop. No secret at all. To this end…here is the most 'Nelsony' beer we’ve ever attempted. We’ve added Nelson on top of Nelson, squeezed a bit more Nelson in, and then finished it off with some Nelson. Super smooth. Super light. Super Nelson. ⁣ Verdant Brewing Co - Unconventional Tactics
item.beer_style: IPA - Imperial / Double New England / Hazy

item.title: DUPOND
item.beer_description: Single hop Mosaic! Offers aromas and flavors of tropical fruit, citrus, and a hint of pine. It is characterized by a smooth, fruity, and full-bodied taste. KOM Beer - DUPOND
item.beer_style: IPA - Imperial / Double New England / Hazy

item.title: DUPONT
item.beer_description: Single hop Citra! It is a hazy, fruit-forward beer with blueberry, tropical fruit, and citrus notes. KOM Beer - DUPONT
item.beer_style: IPA - Imperial / Double New England / Hazy

item.title: lACEd In Space
item.beer_description: Now with even more ACE in your Space. lACEd gets the double dry hop treatment with more Citra and Galaxy to trash your tastebuds. Other Half Brewing Co. - lACEd In Space
item.beer_style: IPA - Imperial / Double New England / Hazy

item.title: Hop Duos! - Nelson + Mosaic
item.beer_description: Hop Duos is the intersection of two great hops, in this case our hand selected Nelson Sauvin and Mosaic. This series is about finding hop combinations that bring out greatness in each other to make top notch IPA's. New world fruity white wine notes, blueberry and tropical fruit character come together with this fun combo. Other Half Brewing Co. - Hop Duos! - Nelson + Mosaic

item.title: Cheddar
item.beer_description: Just your usual dairy-free cheese-less beer with a blend of Citra, Ekuanot, Kohatu and Wai-iti on a base of 2-row, oats and wheat. Other Half Brewing Co. - Cheddar
item.beer_style: IPA - Imperial / Double New England / Hazy

item.title: Stacks On Stacks: Southern Hemisphere
item.beer_description: This Stacks version has the usually grain bill but has the Mosaic, Citra, and El Dorado swapped out for a decidedly more southern affair of Nelson Sauvin, Motueka and Riwaka, all from NZ. Other Half Brewing Co. - Stacks On Stacks: Southern Hemisphere
item.beer_style: IPA - Imperial / Double New England / Hazy

item.title: Dream In Green
item.beer_description: Dream in Green is brewed with a bunch of oats and a hint of lactose before we hop it heavily with Citra, Motueka, Wai-iti. Other Half Brewing Co. - Dream In Green

item.title: Double Nelson Daydream
item.beer_description: Imperial Oat Cream IPA with our hand selected Nelson Sauvin hops with a huge amount of oats and a hint of lactose. Other Half Brewing Co. - Double Nelson Daydream
item.beer_style: IPA - Imperial / Double New England / Hazy

item.title: Gouda
item.beer_description: Stacked up with Citra, Strata, Comet, and Eclipse. Comet was originally bred and released in the 60's but didn't make the cut for the American style light lagers of the time. But it's big on zesty citrus character and pineapple. Eclipse is a new Australian variety that has a lot of sweet orange and fruit flavors. Other Half Brewing Co. - Gouda
item.beer_style: IPA - Imperial / Double New England / Hazy

item.title: Juice Collector
item.beer_description: Another in our series of labels with the talented folks @morningbreath is hopped with a terpy mix of Citra, Citra Incognito, Chinook, Simcoe, Enigma and Sabro Cryo. Soft, fruity and dank. Other Half Brewing Co. - Juice Collector
item.beer_style: IPA - Imperial / Double New England / Hazy

item.title: Big Nectaron Vibes
item.beer_description: Big peachy, pineapple vibes with an undercurrent of delicious tropical fruit punch with a little dankness to pull it all together. Other Half Brewing Co. - Big Nectaron Vibes

item.title: Ticker Shock
item.beer_description: That secondary can be a beast right? Back at it with the crew over @morningbreathinc on this juice bomb of a DIPA with our hand selected lots of Citra, Citra Incognito, Strata, Nelson Sauvin, and Mosaic. Other Half Brewing Co. - Ticker Shock
item.beer_style: IPA - Imperial / Double New England / Hazy

item.title: Parade
item.beer_description: Saturated in Citra, Mosaic and Idaho 7 this 6% London Fog IPA is brimming with fruit bubblegum flavours of mango, orange peel, pineapple and ripe flat peaches. Beak - Parade

item.title: West To the Sand
item.beer_description: A West Coast Triple Dry Hopped Double IPA brewed with our mates from Floc & Beak. Hopped with Columbus, Chinook, Amarillo, Nectaron, Simcoe, Amarillo Cryo, Simcoe Dynaboost & Mosaic Cryo Rivington Brewing Co - West To the Sand

item.title: Dead Alive
item.beer_description: A Double IPA brewed with our mates from Friends Of The Tap. Hopped with El Dorado, Citra, Citra Dynaboost, Eclipse, El Dorado Cryo, Citra Cryo & El Dorado Quantum Brite Rivington Brewing Co - Dead Alive

item.title: Canna
item.beer_description: Three of our dankest hops combine in this sticky, hazy, full-throttle DIPA. Showcasing the best of Nelson Sauvin, Mosaic and Enigma for notes of resin, cedar and flinty white wine. Beak - Canna
item.beer_style: IPA - Imperial / Double New England / Hazy

item.title: Cold Woods (Ghost COLD WOODS)
item.beer_description: We decided that this barleywine was worth a re-brew, especially since it has such a badass label. The brew team has gone to great lengths to take this beer to the next level, and we KNOW you're all going to love it! Think you're not a barleywine fan? Think again! Full, semi-sweet, and chewy body with a sticky texture offering malt driven notes of honey, toffee, and stone fruit with just enough bitterness for balance. Adroit Theory - Cold Woods (Ghost COLD WOODS)

item.title: Dolcita - Meet Our Friends from USA - Yakima Chief Hops
item.beer_description: Beer brewed in collaboration with their friends from the US, Yakima Chief Hops. A unique single hop created to commemorate the renaming of HBC 1019, debuting as Dolcita. This beer is an explosion of aromas of spicy fruit, tropical, and citrus notes, enriched with a delicate, sweet aromatic layer. Juicy, smooth, and full-bodied. A perfect example of how a single hop can shape the entire character of a beer. Nepo Brewing - Dolcita
item.beer_style: IPA - Imperial / Double New England / Hazy

item.title: Discover the Barycz Valley
item.beer_description: Inspired by the extraordinary nature of the Barycza Valley and the picturesque Milicki Ponds, they created a beer that captures the lightness and freshness of this place. It's Session Hazy IPA – hazy, juicy hops, and easy to drink, perfect for discovering new flavors in good company. Nepo Brewing - Discover the Barycz Valley

item.title: D-Tonacja 9th Edition
item.beer_description: 9th edition of their cyclical, annual beer. A strong Imperial Stout with deep and intense aromas of dark chocolate, coffee and roasted malt which creates a truly decadent taste experience. Nepo Brewing - D-Tonacja 9th Edition

item.title: Doppel Rauchbock
item.beer_description: Double smoked bock is a beer brewed with unique dark, smoked and caramel malts. Nepo Brewing - Doppel Rauchbock

item.title: Crazy Lines Series: Avalanche
item.beer_description: This beer is brewed with a classic "holy trinity" blend of modern hops: Citra, Nelson Sauvin, and Motueka. Expect a soft, full, and hazy body that delivers a massive and multi-layered explosion of flavour. The profile is an intense wave of juicy tropical fruit (passionfruit), bright citrus (lime, grapefruit), and elegant white wine grape. Nepo Brewing - Crazy Lines Series: Avalanche

item.title: Crazy Lines Series: Polar Shift
item.beer_description: A hearty and refreshing beer where hops take center stage. Tropical fruits, citrus, and resin notes meet a distinct bitterness to create an intense, new wave character. Nepo Brewing - Crazy Lines Series: Polar Shift

item.title: Crazy Lines Series: Fun
item.beer_description: Neipa hopped with the HBC 630 variety Nepo Brewing - Crazy Lines Series: Fun

item.title: Genesis
item.beer_description: Genesis is a Hazy IPA that pours a pale golden color. It has a dry-hop of Palisade and Cashmere hops, which creates a kaleidoscope of aromas with notes of ripe melon, pineapple, and fresh-cut grass. Each sip reveals a soft body that fills the palate with refreshing fruity and floral flavors. A micro-universe of compounds for a universe of flavors. Basqueland Brewing - Genesis

item.title: TopTen
item.beer_description: For ten years, our mission has been to brew exceptional beers. To celebrate this milestone, we've created Top Ten, the centerpiece of our anniversary series and the official beer of our tenth birthday. This commemorative DDH DIPA represents everything we've learned and everything we're passionate about. Its design is a tribute to the landscapes, flora, and fauna of the Basque Country, which make our land so special. We've selected the best hops to give it a lush and powerful character, with 25g/L of hops that highlight the intense tropical notes accompanied by red fruits like currants, with an intense 'dank' character and a rounded flavor that take the beer straight to the top. Basqueland Brewing - TopTen
item.beer_style: IPA - Imperial / Double New England / Hazy

item.title: Winner Winner Citra Dinner
item.beer_description: 10th ANNIVERSARY SERIES: 10 beers, 10 moments that made history. To celebrate our 10th anniversary, we’ve brought back Winner Winner Citra Dinner, one of the most influential beers in our history. We were pioneers in combining different formats of the same hop to maximize its aromatic power. In this case, it’s all about Citra. We’ve blended Citra T90, Citra BBC, Citra Cryo, Citra Incognito, and Citra Hyperboost to unleash a winning intensity and range of aromas: grapefruit, lime, guava, passion fruit, along with resinous and “dank” notes. It’s a true celebration of one of our most beloved hops. Basqueland Brewing - Winner Winner Citra Dinner

item.title: Omnivore
item.beer_description: Our brewers, in a stroke of genius, have forged a new path, crafting a Vegan Oat Cream IPA so smooth it feels like a dream. We bypassed the trad ways, skipping the lactose and let the colossal dose of oats make its magic. The result is a body as soft and boundless as a cloud. It's bursting with intense tropical aromas of passion fruit, and mango balanced with a 'dank' hemp profile. A truly snackable hop bite with a oat heart. Basqueland Brewing - Omnivore

item.title: Phases
item.beer_description: A Hazy DIPA with Nectaron, Motueka & Bru-1. 'Like the moon, we can think that hops have different phases, varying with each crop year, from the picking window to the soil they were grown in. This DIPA is dry hopped with a new Motueka, Nectaron and Bru-1 batch we received, with loads of NZ funk and a hefty amount of fruitiness, like lime, pineapple and stone fruits.' Head Brewer Jirka Ordén Factory Brewing - Phases
item.beer_style: IPA - Imperial / Double New England / Hazy

item.title: Effortless Motion
item.beer_description: A Hazy TIPA with Motueka, Riwaka & Vic Secret. 'We continue our Triple IPAs with Effortless Motion, hopped with Motueka, Riwaka & Vic Secret. Absolutely love this hop combo! Motueka builds the 'factory foundation' and Riwaka brings the brightness that TIPAs need. Vic Secret is really beautiful with its bright pineapple aromas.' Head Brewer Jirka Ordén Factory Brewing - Effortless Motion

item.title: IPA Pack
item.beer_description: The Ārpus Brewing pack consists of: - Ārpus X Brasserie Popihn Imperial Cascadian Dark Ale - TDH Riwaka X Galaxy DIPA - Ārpus X Factory Quintuple Dry Hopped Motueka X Nelson Sauvin QIPA Arpus Brewing Co. - Arpus Brewing Co. - IPA Pack

item.title: IPA Pack
item.beer_description: The Tired Hands Brewing Company pack consists of: - DDH Alien Church (Citra & Galaxy) - Milkshake IPA (Strawberry) - Refreshing

item.title: Pack
item.beer_description: The DankHouse Brewing Company pack consists of: - Granny's Candy Bowl - Deady Bears - Dank Hunt

item.title: IPA Pack
item.beer_description: The Tin Barn Brewing pack consists of: - Orange Party - Citra Kong - Barn Snake

item.title: IPA Pack
item.beer_description: The Wood Brothers Brewing pack consists of: - Neca-Tron (2025) - Thistle Dew - Holy Hazel - Blind Fog

item.title: Drake Passage
item.beer_description: Citra, Peacharine and Nelson Sauvin Imperial IPA. Azvex Brewing Company - Drake Passage

item.title: Mariana's Web
item.beer_description: Mosaic, Nelson Sauvin, Waimea & Peacharine Azvex Brewing Company - Mariana's Web

item.title: IPA Pack
item.beer_description: The Hoof Hearted Brewing pack consists of: - South of Eleven (2025) - Wet When Slippery (Pineapple & Mango) - Cowboy Konkey Dong (2025)

item.title: Double Mosaic Dream
item.beer_description: Our classic Mosaic focused Imperial IPA containing our hand selected Mosaic, Mosaic Cryo and Mosaic Incognito. Notes of blueberry, mango and orange. Other Half Brewing Co. - Double Mosaic Dream
item.beer_style: IPA - Imperial / Double New England / Hazy

item.title: Coastbusters
item.beer_description: If there's something strange… In your neighborhood… Who you gonna call ? Coastbusters is our collab with our friends from Schwarze Rose (Main, Germany). The idea was to be in the middle of the two coasts. West coast-ish grain bill and water, East coast-ish yeast and hops. No big haze, not really crystal clear… Precisely what we wanted ! Speaking about hops, we selected Amarillo and Simcoe for a west side touch and Rakau and Eclipse for the east side. It’s a pacific hops tour and already sounds like your new favorite pacific IPA (if it’s really existing?!). Norm Brewing - Coastbusters

item.title: Bouncy Ride
item.beer_description: Bouncy, bumpy, shaky, that’s what we love when meeting our favorite and the loveliest hooligans ever ! We used what we love the most, NZ hops, a bit of science, high hop charges, love and everything in a sticky Double Hazy IPA. A hint of science during the whirpool with a charge of YCH 702 / Dynaboost Mosaic to start with what we are excepting from a DIPA, tropics, mango and guava. Then to give some more complexity, we massively dry hopped with Waimea and Nectaron to bring bright citrus, pomelo, stone & tropical fruits, peachy and apricoty like notes before going to a slight piney finish. Norm Brewing - Bouncy Ride
item.beer_style: IPA - Imperial / Double New England / Hazy

item.title: Polyghost
item.beer_description: Here is the third and last birthday collab with the one and only Ophiussa Brewing ! After 2 collabs at his place, the wonderful Setubal, and several meetings with Daniel, one of the nicest guys we met in the beer industry, it was time to get a return collab ! We decided to brew the “biggest” beer of these 3 releases and show you one more time our shared passion for saturated and hazy beer. Polyghost is a Triple New England IPA bursting at 9,2% and saturated with Nectaron, Citra, CRYO Citra, Strata and GCX Strata… This TIPA will let shine wonderful pineapple and peach flavors, citrus-like notes followed by very dank flavors, strawberry, melon and some funky bubblegum. Hops : Nectaron, Citra, CRYO Citra, Strata & GCX Strata Norm Brewing - Polyghost

item.title: Roulez Jeunesse
item.beer_description: West Coast IPA DDH that combines tradition and modernity with 'old school' hops, Centennial and Chinook, which bring their resinous and racy aroma, and Citra for a very fruity explosiveness! Collab' with the Burgundy brewery Independent Beer Co. Fauve - Roulez Jeunesse

item.title: Révélateur D'Ombres
item.beer_description: We blended some of our finest barrels of Imperial Stout aged in rum barrels (which had previously contained Oloroso) to create this unique blend. For even more tropical indulgence, we added a coconut finish. The aging lasted 18 months in rum barrels. A rare beer, of which only 1,646 cans were produced! Fauve - Revelateur D'Ombres

item.title: Renaître De Ses Cendres
item.beer_description: A double NEIPA DDH, in collaboration with the German brewery Sudden Death. Powerful and juicy, it's brewed with three characterful hops: Mosaic, Nelson Sauvin, and Sabro, for an explosion of tropical flavors, freshness, and roundness. A beer that proves that, even after the shock, we can always come back stronger. And that the best response to sudden death... is rebirth. Fauve - Renaitre De Ses Cendres
item.beer_style: IPA - Imperial / Double New England / Hazy

item.title: J'irai Où Tu Iras
item.beer_description: This NEIPA DDH is the result of a collaboration with Brasserie du Bas-Canada. These Quebec hop stars crossed the Atlantic with their own Citra in their suitcases, which we married with ours, adding Motueka and Simcoe. It's an aromatic bomb, juicy as can be, and resolutely transatlantic. We hope you find it as harmonious as a legendary Celine Dion / JJG duet. Fauve - J'irai Ou Tu Iras

item.title: Chambre Noire
item.beer_description: This daring blend is a blend of several Imperial Stout barrels: Peated Whiskey barrels and barrels that previously contained Hot Sauce. After blending, we finished with cocoa nibs. In short, here's an unusual mix combining smoky, spicy, and cocoa flavors...in an IS barrel-aged version! Fauve - Chambre Noire

item.title: Living Large
item.beer_description: Finback Brewery - Living Large

item.title: TERNION
item.beer_description: brewed w/ cryo mosaic & super sauvin (NZ), dry hopped w/ krush, nelson sauvin (NZ), and sabro HOMES Brewery - TERNION

item.title: Sumi Ink (2025)
item.beer_description: Imperial stout aged in bourbon barrels with vanilla beans. This storied beer was named for a festival-goer’s mishap: in need of a display bottle of stout while pouring at a beer festival, Lauren filled a bomber with diluted sumi ink that she had at home and put a cap and label on it. After the festival was over, the fascimile had disappeared. Whomever took the bottle was, sadly, in for a disappointment! Grimm Artisanal Ales - Sumi Ink

item.title: Triple Nelson & Cream
item.beer_description: The third release in our Nelson Oat Cream IPA Series features a large dry-hop of Nelson Sauvin, Peacharine, and Riwaka hops. Expect big citrus, grapefruit, and passionfruit notes in a smooth, creamy, easy-drinking body. Fine Balance Brewing - Triple Nelson & Cream

item.title: Temporalis #0039
item.beer_description: Triple IPA - Superdelic, Nelson Sauvin, Citra, Citra Incognito Messorem - Temporalis #0039

item.title: Nelson & Cream
item.beer_description: The first in our quadruple Nelson Oat Cream IPA Series, Nelson & Cream IPA was dry-hopped with Nelson Sauvin and Nelson Sauvin Hyperboost from Yakima Valley. Expect a smooth, creamy mouthfleel, with big tropical stone fruit flavours. Fine Balance Brewing - Nelson & Cream

item.title: Evangelion III [Sachiel] (Ghost Sachiel)
item.beer_description: Hazy & smooth...a little boozy. Well balanced... Adroit Theory - Evangelion III [Sachiel] (Ghost Sachiel)

item.title: Double Nelson & Cream
item.beer_description: The second in our Nelson Oat Cream IPA Series, this DIPA was dry-hopped with Nelson Sauvin, Motueka & Mosaic. Expect notes of over-ripe tropical fruit, pineapple, and mango with a sightly dank finish and piney finish. Fine Balance Brewing - Double Nelson & Cream
item.beer_style: IPA - Imperial / Double New England / Hazy

item.title: A Toast To Ten
item.beer_description: A tenth anniversary beer. Hazy, juicy, strong citrus. Citra, Mosaic, Motueka & Peacharine. Hop Butcher For The World - A Toast To Ten
item.beer_style: IPA - Imperial / Double New England / Hazy

item.title: IPA Pack
item.beer_description: The Third Moon Brewing pack contains: - Double Winterseed (DIPA) - Bell Tree (2025) (TIPA) - Separation Rage (2025) (QIPA)

item.title: Pack
item.beer_description: The Third Moon Brewing pack contains: - Double Winterseed (DIPA) - Bell Tree (2025) (TIPA) - Separation Rage (2025) (QIPA) - From Underneath (2025) (Porter) - Dead Don't Die (2025) (Stout)

item.title: Hand Truck Heroes
item.beer_description: For all those heroes out there holding it down for their team, this new drop designed by our friends @morningbreathinc is for you. This one has Mosaic, Mosaic Incognito, Citra, Motueka and Citra and Mosaic Cryo. Other Half Brewing Co. - Hand Truck Heroes
item.beer_style: IPA - Imperial / Double New England / Hazy

item.title: Triple Citra Daydream
item.beer_description: Oats, a hint of milk sugar and tons of Citra combine to make Citra hop candy. Other Half Brewing Co. - Triple Citra Daydream

item.title: All Green Everything
item.beer_description: An aluminum green capsule of good times with Amarillo and our hand-selected Motueka, Citra and Mosaic. Other Half Brewing Co. - All Green Everything

item.title: My Favorite Things
item.beer_description: A Hazy IPA with Motueka & Nelson Sauvin 'The 2025 crops of Motueka and Nelson are here, so of course I need to put my favorite things together. Tons of saturated aroma in this one, expect white wine, grapefruit, lime, melon and some nice earthy funkiness.' Head Brewer Jirka Ordén Factory Brewing - My Favorite Things

item.title: Daydreamer 2025
item.beer_description: A Hazy DIPA with Nelson Sauvin & Mosaic. 'This is a new batch of our Daydreamer Hazy DIPA with Nelson Sauvin and Mosaic. This recipe was originally brewed in our previous location. This beer stood out with its beautiful hop profile and label. So I need to have another round with this recipe, enjoy!' Head Brewer Jirka Ordén Factory Brewing - Daydreamer 2025
item.beer_style: IPA - Imperial / Double New England / Hazy

item.title: BA Daybreak Speedway
item.beer_description: Imperial Stout Aged 25 Months in Bourbon Barrels with Blueberries, Vanilla, and Cloud Cover Coffee Other Half Brewing Co. - BA Daybreak Speedway

item.title: 2 Year Reserve Bourbon County Brand Stout (2019)
item.beer_description: 2-Year Reserve Bourbon County Brand Stout was aged 24 months in 11-year-old 25th Anniversary Knob Creek barrels. The barrels of this once in a lifetime bourbon delivered an oak-forward intensity accented with subtle hazelnut and chocolate notes that complimented the flavors inherent in Original Bourbon County Stout. 2-Year Reserve is incredibly special, and we’re excited to share this variant with you all. Goose Island Beer Co. - 2 Year Reserve Bourbon County Brand Stout (2019)

item.title: Players 1 - Batch 2
item.beer_description: Players 1 (Batch 2) is an American Imperial Stout brewed with Madagascar vanilla beans, Fiji cacao nibs, toasted coconut, and Mostra Coffee ghost bear espresso. No lactose was harmed in this beers creation. It pours jet black with a beautiful deep tan head. The dynamics of the relative adjunct strength shift as the beer warms and time lengthens. Batch 2 has the same creamy flavor of some of our favorite things: coffee at first and then a transformation to chocolate brownie batter sprinkled with toasted coconut flakes followed by notes of vanilla-marshmallow to balance it out. Equilibrium Brewery - Players 1 - Batch 2

item.title: Frothy
item.beer_description: DDH DIPA with Enigma, Citra, Hallertau Blanc and Mosaic hops. Finback Brewery - Frothy

item.title: Tres Hekse
item.beer_description: To ol - Tres Hekse

item.title: Georgia Gold
item.beer_description: NO PEACH OR PASSIONFRUIT ADDED! Inspired by the peach and nectarine groves blossoming around Penedès, where the fruit swells day by day. Imagine biting into the juiciest peach ever — dripping down your arms and ruining your t-shirt, but you don’t care. Fermented with White Labs’ London Fog yeast, this brew naturally develops bright passionfruit notes, blending into the ultimate fruit salad with a raspberry drizzle on top. Garage Beer Co. - Georgia Gold

item.title: City Cake 2025
item.beer_description: City Cake is back! ? Our annual Peanut & Vanilla Imperial Stout, brewed especially for the city's holiday. And as always, it has a good portion of roasted peanuts, delicate vanilla, a pinch of salt for the perfect balance and our love. It is rich, deep, a little sweet, a little salty - just like Kyiv itself, a city with character. Varvar Brew - City Cake 2025

item.title: NEEDLES

item.title: CROWNS
item.beer_description: DIPA ELABORADA CON CITRA, STRATA Y MOSAIC (T90 Y SPECTRUM) PARA LOGRAR SABORES A PIÑA Garage Beer Co. - CROWNS

item.title: FUERST WIACEK Berlin Pack

item.beer_description: THE DON. 30g/l dry hop. This is it. This is it turned up to 11. This is peak Citra and Galaxy. Gigantic in every way. Verdant Brewing Co - The Don

item.beer_description: A Triple Dry-hopped No Dextrose DIPA version of 'Even Sharks Need Water'. Simples. Verdant Brewing Co - Whale Sharks

item.title: Flux: Phase 3
item.beer_description: An 8% DIPA that lets NZH-101 off the leash! Lime, lemonade, dank. A thing of beauty. FLUX is a really special three beer collaboration with Track. Brewing Co. We have combined our hoppy knowledge to create levels of saturation, flavours and aromatics bordering on the insane! Each beer in the series is an absolute monster with a different New Zealand hop leading the charge: Nelson Sauvin, Nectaron and NZH-101. Verdant Brewing Co - Flux: Phase 3
item.beer_style: IPA - Imperial / Double New England / Hazy

item.title: Solitude, Silence And Darkness 2025
item.beer_description: Double mash Imperial Stout brewed with maple syrup. Aged for 15 months in Bourbon barrels with vanilla sticks and infused coffee, then conditioned with Madagascar vanilla beans and barrel aged coffee. Brasseria Della Fonte - Solitude, Silence And Darkness 2025

item.title: Vertige
item.beer_description: Vertige est brassée avec une combinaison de houblons néo-zélandais (Nelson Sauvin et Motueka) et américain (Citra). C'est la jonction de trois houblons que nous aimons particulièrement pour leurs caractères uniques. Brasserie du Bas-Canada - Vertige

item.beer_description: Dry hopped with Anchovy, Nelson Sauvin, Nectaron, and Maui Nelson Hop Kief. DankHouse Brewing Company - Mutant Turtle Pizza
item.beer_style: IPA - Imperial / Double New England / Hazy

item.title: Digi Digi Digi
item.beer_description: In the words of the great Rza.......Hoppy Hoppy Hoppy, Digi Digi Digi. You're a** will be stuck on this beer like a Victoria Secret wedgie. We dry hopped this one with Citra, Strata, and Nectaron. DankHouse Brewing Company - Digi Digi Digi

item.title: Kentuckley (2024)
item.beer_description: Transient Artisan Ales - Kentuckley (2024)

item.title: Triple Stars
item.beer_description: Triple Stars is filled with raw wheat, malted wheat, and flaked wheat which makes it ethereal and soft. It’s triple-dry hopped with Strata, Vic Secret, and Citra hops. If you know these hops, you know this beer is ultra juicy, full of orange juice, mango and grapefruit essence. This beer is super phosphorescent (minus the radiation...) and ultra bright. It’s velvety and full and bursting with flavor. PS: The label of only one can is upside down attached. Perhaps a collector's item? Please, specifically ask for it if you want this one. Celestial Beerworks - Triple Stars

item.title: Cosmic Mountain
item.beer_description: Citra, Waimea & Mosaic-hopped Triple India Pale Ale Hop Butcher For The World - Cosmic Mountain

item.title: Double Stars
item.beer_description: Double Stars approaches the traditional malt base with a slight twist. Instead of using just oats and wheat, we focused on 3 kinds of wheat to give the beer more of a velvety and fluffy body. It’s brewed with malted wheat, raw wheat, and flaked wheat. Hopped with delightful amounts of Idaho 7 and Vic Secret, this beer has a complex aroma of dank pineapple and mango that explodes out of your glass. This 8% banger is slightly viscous with loads of body and softness. Double Stars is full of passionfruit, mango flesh and ripe pineapple, and is as juicy as can be. Celestial Beerworks - Double Stars
item.beer_style: IPA - Imperial / Double New England / Hazy

item.title: Cats Are People Too
item.beer_description: DIPA dry hopped with Citra, Mosaic, Nelson and Belma. Finback Brewery - Cats Are People Too
item.beer_style: IPA - Imperial / Double New England / Hazy

item.title: Maniac Brainiac
item.beer_description: Finback Brewery - Maniac Brainiac

item.title: Serpentin
item.beer_description: This first collaboration with the beautiful gang from All My Friends, in Prince Edward County, Ontario, is truly silly! A finish just sweet enough to camouflage the bitterness and highlight the alcohol that comes to play with your jowls. It's green, but balanced, saturated in hops, but with a thiccccc mouthfeel. With Nelson Sauvin Bliss, Nelson Sauvin Cryo, Citra, Citra Dynaboost and Peacharine hops, in addition to a late variant of Nelson Sauvin that provides different notes - more towards grapefruit and guava than the traditional winey notes - we have a gigantic hop bomb, perfect to accompany you in your misfortunes with friends. Wishing you as much fun as we had with the gang from All My Friends. Cheers! Brasserie Sir John Brewing Co. - Serpentin

item.title: Balle Perdue
item.beer_description: It's happened to all of us. A home run with a little too much arm juice that sends the ball flying off a flat roof. A drive after a visit to the bar that sends the ball into the 6th-floor pond. A wrist shot in the cafeteria that sends the foosball ball too close to a lifeguard. That's kind of where this beer gets its name from. We were at Messorem's, playing a quick game of impromptu deck hockey, when a slightly imprecise slap shot made the ball disappear under the barrels. There's no more magic in the name than that. But in the beer, there... phew! It's heavy! We blended two Barley Wines. One aged 16 months in St. Augustine bourbon barrels and another aged 18 months in Ninkasi French whiskey barrels. Then conditioned with Madagascar vanilla to round out its already very sweet side! It's sick! A beautiful and minimal acidity on the tip of the tongue followed by the light sparkle of carbonation. Chocolatey aromas of caramel brownies, figs, dates, rub shoulders with the woody presence of whiskey and bourbon. Finesse, suppleness, delicacy under an untimely invigorating heat. We may never have found the ball, but we found you a damn good beer! CHEERS! Brasserie Sir John Brewing Co. - Balle Perdue

item.title: Temporalis #0037
item.beer_description: Triple IPA - Motueka, Citra, Vic Secret, Citra Incognito Messorem - Temporalis #0037

item.beer_style: IPA - Imperial / Double New England / Hazy

item.title: Obelisk
item.beer_description: A monumental hop combo in a world filled with haze. Hops: Nelson and Nelson Cryo, Citra and Citra Cryo, Galaxy. Over 40 grams per litre of them all combined in this exploration of the OBELISK. - Revenant Brewing Project - Obelisk

item.title: Linger
item.beer_description: Hops: Nelson - Revenant Brewing Project - Linger

item.beer_description: Hops: Motueka & Southern Cross

item.title: Hops Fwd
item.beer_description: Quelques brasseries sont sélectionnées pour tester les nouveaux produits de houblon de Yakima Chief et il nous fait grand plaisir d'en faire partie! Cette triple NEIPA intègre le YCH803 Citra, un nouvel extrait très aromatique de houblon. Combiné avec du Nelson Sauvin, du Krush et du citra conventionnel;, ce mélange regorge de fruits tropicaux et représente un pas vers le futur des bières houblonnées! Noctem Artisans Brasseurs - Hops Fwd

item.title: Big Pharma
item.beer_description: Hawaiian tropical vibes District 96 Beer Factory - Big Pharma

item.beer_description: Hopped with Enigma and Vic secret. Orange, berry, and tropical fruits. District 96 Beer Factory - Trade War

item.beer_description: Idaho 7 CGX, Citra & Krush SOMA Beer - Hologram

item.title: Ghost
item.beer_description: Nelson CGX, Citra & Rakau SOMA Beer - Ghost

item.title: Grit
item.beer_description: Strata CGX & Citra SOMA Beer - Grit

item.title: Turbo
item.beer_description: Nectaron & Riwaka SOMA Beer - Turbo
