item.title: Mirage
item.beer_description: Citra & Wai-iti SOMA Beer - Mirage

item.title: A Deathless Song
item.beer_description: This Barrel aged Tiramisu stout was created for the wedding of Caitlin and Robin. Aged for 1,5 years on a Jamaican Rum barrel and 2 Bourbon Barrels. Brewed with typical Boudoir cookies and coffeebeans, infused with homemade Amaretto. Galea Craft Beers - A Deathless Song

item.title: The Mind of Annapurna Bourbon Barrel Aged
item.beer_description: The Mind of Annapurna BA, is a imperial Chai Latté Milk Stout aged for 2 years in 2nd fill Buffalo Trace Bourbon Barrels. 2nd fill in this case means a Bourbon finished on a Bourbon barrel. So 2 times filled with a Bourbon before our stout. The taste of the spices in the beer is more round, some vanilla and barrel notes and a nice bourbon flavour. Galea Craft Beers - The Mind of Annapurna Bourbon Barrel Aged

item.title: MEGA MUFFIN
item.beer_description: with YCH 701 HyperBoost Stigbergets Bryggeri - MEGA MUFFIN

item.title: EL CAPITANO
item.beer_description: Let’s do a pelican but call it EL CAPITANO. The captain of all DIPA. Stigbergets Bryggeri - EL CAPITANO
item.beer_style: IPA - Imperial / Double New England / Hazy

item.title: TOP PICK
item.beer_description: After receiving some freshly emptied bourbon barrels direct from Balcones Distillery in Texas we were itching to brew something big, dark and ridiculous. The obvious answer was to give our friend Henok from Omnipollo a ring and ask if he fancied helping us conjure something up. After almost 2 years of aging we decided it was time to take out the beer and lightly enhance it with coconut, hazelnut and vanilla so as to not get too much in the way of the barrel character. Stigbergets Bryggeri - TOP PICK

item.title: Meadows
item.beer_description: A Hazy IPA with Citra, Rakau & Bru-1 'Meadows is dry hopped with an interesting hop combo of Citra, Rakau and Bru-1. Loads of fruitiness from Citra and Bru-1 with Rakau bringing that NZ funk and dankness with some sweet stone fruit notes.' Head Brewer Jirka Ordén Factory Brewing - Meadows

item.title: 9 Years Anniversary Set
item.beer_description: The 9 Year Anniversary Set consists of: - Confronting Suitors - Return To Ithaca - Calypso's Temptation - Helios' Island - Scylla And Charybdis - Siren Encounter - Journey To Hades - Circes' Enchantment - Cyclops Escape

item.title: 9 Years: Helios' Island
item.beer_description: A stout that takes you to the legendary island of Helios, where alluring flavors captivate you. This 11% mega stout combines tonka, muscovado, vanilla, and Colombian coffee and cacao for a rich, layered experience. With muscovado from Barbados, adding rich molasses, toffee, and lightly smoky notes, along with deep flavors of cacao, coffee, and caramel, this beer is full and complex. The Colombian cacao contributes hints of cocoa, citrus, dried fruit, and walnuts, while the coffee brings honeyed aromas and a touch of red berries. Tonka and vanilla add a subtle creaminess that perfectly balances the smoky and earthy notes. Seductive flavors that would even distract Odysseus from his quest. Moersleutel Craft Brewery - 9 Years: Helios' Island

item.title: 9 Years: Calypso’s Temptation
item.beer_description: Everything about this beer is luxurious – from the carefully selected whiskey barrels to the rare vanilla. Seductive, extravagant, and irresistible. This stout was aged in three American whiskey barrels: Weller Wheated (sweet and smooth), Sazerac Rye (spicy, lightly smoky), and Heaven Hill (reliable and well-balanced). To complete the temptation, we added vanilla from Madagascar, Papua New Guinea, and rare beans from the Comoros Islands – offering rich, pastry-like depth with a hint of tobacco. Layers of creamy vanilla, warm whiskey notes, oak, and spice make this beer both complex and captivating. This stout is like Calypso herself: luxurious, enchanting, and nearly impossible to resist. Moersleutel Craft Brewery - 9 Years: Calypsos Temptation

item.title: 9 Years: Confronting Suitors
item.beer_description: This beer is the crown jewel of Moersleutel’s 9th anniversary series, the ultimate expression of luxury and complexity. We’ve pulled out all the stops for this non-adjunct barrel-aged stout. This beer has aged on two exceptional barrels. The first, originally used not for spirits but for high grade maple syrup, imparts a deep, salty sweetness that’s truly one of a kind. In contrast, the spicy, lightly smoky character of Sazerac Rye bourbon barrels adds depth. Together, they create a beer that’s both robust and refined, with a layered complexity that keeps surprising. Just as Odysseus returned to confront the suitors, this stout marks the grand finale of our 9-year brewing journey: powerful, intense, and unmistakably Moersleutel. Expect rich notes of salty maple, spicy rye whiskey, smoky oak, and a full-bodied finish that lingers. An epic finale to an epic anniversary celebration. Cheers Sleutelaars! Moersleutel Craft Brewery - 9 Years: Helios' Island

item.title: NECROPUNK (Ghost NECROPUNK)
item.beer_description: How would it feel, if you were playing the guitar at your mom's bedroom, and Cannibal Corpse invited you to share the stage? This huge DIPA, is the result of our collaboration with our favourite brewing company, the mighty Adroit Theory. And this, also is, a great proof that sometimes dreams come true. Or nightmares, in this case! Brewed and released, back to back, with NECROSYNTH Hazy QIPA. Adroit Theory - NECROPUNK (Ghost NECROPUNK)
item.beer_style: IPA - Imperial / Double New England / Hazy

item.title: 9 Years: Journey To Hades
item.beer_description: A trip to the underworld has never been this tropical. Journey to Hades is a bold TIPA bursting with flavors of passionfruit, lemon zest, and tangerine. Brewed with Riwaka in T90, Cryo, and Amplifire Oil, plus Idaho-7 and Citra in T90, Cryo, and hop oil extract form. Riwaka stands out with its intense passionfruit and citrus punch – truly breathtaking. The Amplifire Oil is made from ultra-fresh Riwaka hops, processed into oil the same day they're picked. You can’t get any fresher than that. Double mashed and packed with character. Over the top? Absolutely. But above all: seriously delicious. Moersleutel Craft Brewery - 9 Years: Journey To Hades

item.title: 9 Years: Return To Ithaca
item.beer_description: Coming home after a long journey – that feeling is captured in every sip of this quadrupel. Layered with notes of raisins, dried fruit, and smooth caramel—a beer steeped in warmth and memory. What sets it apart is its nuanced oak treatment: spirals, cubes, and a touch of liquid tannins lend soft vanilla, gentle spice, and refined wood tones that elevate without overpowering. Brewed with barley, rye, wheat, and spelt, it boasts a full, rounded body and a deeply expressive malt character. A beer full of stories—complex, comforting, and unforgettable Moersleutel Craft Brewery - 9 Years: Return To Ithaca

item.title: 9 Years: Scylla And Charybdis
item.beer_description: A stout that challenges you, just like the legendary sea monsters Scylla and Charybdis. This rich 11% stout delivers an irresistible combination of peanuts, cacao, and nougat – inspired by a famous candy bar, but even better. With 300 kg of peanuts and 60 kg of Bolivian cacao, known for its natural nutty flavor, you get a deep and rich foundation. Bold roasted coffee adds earthy depth, while vanilla rounds everything out with a smooth, creamy finish. Complex and full of character, yet always perfectly balanced. A stout so captivating, even the raging sea monsters pause to enjoy this treat. Moersleutel Craft Brewery - 9 Years: Scylla And Charybdis

item.title: Endolith (2025)
item.beer_description: This bourbon barrel aged Barleywine style ale was brewed with Maris Otter, Munich, brown sugar, and lots of caramel malt. Ten malts, a long boil, and barrel aging came together to create a complex Barleywine with notes of rich caramel, oolong tea, bruleed sugar, and well-aged spirit. This vintage of Endolith was aged in a blend of Baker's and Maker's casks for 24 months that lent a supple mouthfeel from their inclusion of rye and wheat. Jackie Os Brewery - Endolith (2025)

item.title: Everybody Wants Some!! 3X (Citra)
item.beer_description: Hoof Hearted Brewing - Everybody Wants Some!! 3X (Citra)

item.title: Ces Vipères
item.beer_description: DIPA - Citra, Galaxy, Strata, El Dorado Messorem - Ces Viperes
item.beer_style: IPA - Imperial / Double New England / Hazy

item.title: Oban
item.beer_description: Noctem Artisans Brasseurs - Oban

item.title: Château
item.beer_description: Château est une New England Double IPA brassée en collaboration avec nos amis Ontarien Third Moon. Une explosion tropicale signée 100 % Freestyle Hops : NZ Cascade, Peacharine, Rakau, Motueka SubZero Hop Kief et NZ Cascade Hop Kief. Ce cocktail d'houblons libère des notes vibrantes d’agrumes, de fruits tropicaux et de pêche bien mûre, soutenues par une texture onctueuse et une amertume douce. Le genre de DIPA qu'on aime, puissante et veloutée. Santé ! Nano Cinco - Chateau
item.beer_style: IPA - Imperial / Double New England / Hazy

item.title: Forteresse
item.beer_description: Forteresse est une New England Quadruple IPA brassée en collaboration avec nos amis de chez Bière Boréale. Intensément houblonnée, elle met en valeur une sélection exceptionnelle de houblons issus de Freestyle Hops et de Jackson Hop Farm : Peacharine, Nelson Sauvin, Motueka SubZero Hop Kief (Freestyle) et ID-158 Pink (Jackson). Cette combinaison déploie des arômes éclatants de sauvignon blanc, de nectarine et d’agrumes, portés par une texture soyeuse. Une bière puissante, dont la douceur veloutée masque habilement son haut taux d’alcool. Nano Cinco - Forteresse

item.title: Bistro Peach Strawberry Rhubarb Cobbler
item.beer_description: Berliner style weisse beer with peaches, strawberries, rhubarb, cinnamon & vanilla. Energy City Brewing - Bistro Peach Strawberry Rhubarb Cobbler

item.title: 12yr Wild Turkey BA Dark Matter (2025)
item.beer_description: This was aged in some very unique 12-year-old Wild Turkey barrels for 12 months and 5 days. The bourbon from these barrels is a rare Japanese-only release and one of the few 12-year-old Wild Turkeys ever made. Barreled Souls Brewing Company - 12yr Wild Turkey BA Dark Matter (2025)

item.title: DDH Attitude
item.beer_description: IPA double dry-hopped w/ Mosaic + Citra. 6% Long Live Beerworks - DDH Attitude

item.title: Nuclear Option
item.beer_description: Northeast QIPA. DDH With Citra, Citra And More Citra.Exploding With White Peach, Pineapples, Snake Fruit And Cotton Candy. District 96 Beer Factory - Nuclear Option

item.title: DDH Black Cat Sees All
item.beer_description: Double IPA double dry-hopped w/ Simcoe, Citra, Galaxy, Azacca + Kohatu. 8.5% Long Live Beerworks - DDH Black Cat Sees All
item.beer_style: IPA - Imperial / Double New England / Hazy

item.title: Gonuts
item.beer_description: GONUTS is our first of many TIPAs to come, and we’re beyond stoked to have brewed it with the undisputed kings of IPA—Badlands Brewing. Crack the can and you're hit with a blast of dank tropical fruit punch on the nose. The mouthfeel is lusciously smooth, delivering wave after wave of sweet mango nectar, ripe orange, strawberry, and guava. The smoothness here can't be overstated—extremely drinkable, dangerously so. It all wraps up with a squeaky clean finish that leaves you reaching for more All My Friends Beer Co. - Gonuts

item.title: Feral
item.beer_description: The team at Slake have become more than just good neighbours and friends—they’re true companions. Always up for a hang or a good chat, we love bouncing ideas around, lending a hand, sharing ingredients, dropping off kegs, or cracking open fresh cans for a taste test. Where would we be without them? Still brewing beer—but it’d be a lot less fun. Feral is a testament to the fearless ingredient experimentation both our breweries live for. This Nelson-3-ways IPA pours a pale straw yellow with a milky haze and a cap of lingering white bubbles. It bursts with unexpected orange on the nose and palate—bright citrus, pithy spice, and just a touch of white grape. Soft and juicy upfront, finishing ultra clean. All My Friends Beer Co. - Feral

item.title: 5 Lives
item.beer_description: A triple IPA, and the next edition to this year’s Anniversary Series! The blend of Emerald Spire, Vic Secret, Simcoe, Krush and Galaxy hops for this special release offers pithy notes of ripe mango, juicy grape and saturated citrus fruits. It’s bold in flavor, while still being super drinkable. Long Live Beerworks - 5 Lives

item.title: RAGE (Ghost RAGE)
item.beer_description: After a 3-year hiatus, we are releasing the 12-part COBRA series. For the 9th release in the series, we focus on the brilliant yet evil: DR. MINDBENDER. A long standing ally to COBRA, his scientific intellect has unleashed countless destructive inventions. Packed with loads + loads of flaked oats, flaked wheat, and spelt for that nice pillowy soft malt body you love from us. Juicy aromatics of fruitiness and forward hop notes of Orange Citrus + Tropical Aromas dominate. A flash of dankness on the back end before finishing with mild bitterness for balance. Double Dry-Hopped | Citra | Mosaic | El Dorado Adroit Theory - RAGE (Ghost RAGE)

item.title: Now I Am Death, Destroyer of Worlds [White Label Edition] (Ghost NOW I AM DEATH)
item.beer_description: We say this is our "flagship Hazy Triple IPA", but we actually haven't made this since May 2023. We figured we needed to bring it back, and give it a special treatment. We love the classic BLACK label, but we have this WHITE variant that is a nice twist.⁠ ⁠ We gave this one the same hop saturation that we did for our Anniversary Version of EBK. Absolutely loaded with hop aroma, flavor + intensity. Opaque, pillowy + semi-sweet body; intensely juicy citrus flavor + aromas. ⁠ Double Dry-Hopped | Citra | El Dorado | Galaxy Adroit Theory - Now I Am Death, Destroyer of Worlds (Ghost DESTROYER)

item.title: Mother of All Photo Bombs
item.beer_description: So we took Photo Bombs base and yeast with MOAB hop profile and created MOAPB. This juice crusher has notes of papayas, pineapple juice, peach nechtor and mangos. District 96 Beer Factory - Mother of All Photo Bombs

item.title: BA Sticky Situation
item.beer_description: We teamed up with our best buds @bolerosnort 18 months ago to make this decadent imperial pastry stout. We then rested it in Heaven Hill barrels for 17 months, then conditioned this in our lil spin bot over hundreds of pounds of Thai bananas and monkey rolls. Bring napkins. Imprint Beer Co. - BA Sticky Situation

item.title: Neo-baa-litan (Chocolate)
item.beer_description: Strawberry, Chocolate, and Fluff - series inspired by AJ Baa Baa Brewhouse - Neo-baa-litan (Chocolate)

item.title: Bistro Cabana Watermelon & Pomegranate
item.beer_description: Berliner-style weisse beer with watermelon and pomegranate. Energy City Brewing - Bistro Cabana Watermelon & Pomegranate

item.title: Double Stack
item.beer_description: Double Stack is our Imperial Breakfast Stout aged on whole bean coffee from Portland's Coava Coffee and maple syrup. Great Notion Brewing - Double Stack

item.title: Sancticide
item.beer_description: It’s safe to say our love for the guys over at Third Moon cannot be overstated. Not only are they amazing at making great beer but they are some of the best humans we have met during our journey as a brewery. Sancticide is another great beer brewed between friends. Santicide was brewed with pale colour and thick haze in mind. Pouring extremely pale yellow, with a thick creamy haze. This DIPA boasts a nose of lime, melon, and tropical citrus. So so silky smooth with a luscious full mouthfeel carrying flavours of key lime pie, papaya, mango, and zesty citrus. Delicious and so easy to drink with a dry clean finish. All My Friends Beer Co. - Sancticide
item.beer_style: IPA - Imperial / Double New England / Hazy

item.title: Turbinis
item.beer_description: Triple IPA aux houblons Riwaka, Rakau, Motueka & Nelson Sauvin Brasserie du Bas-Canada - Turbinis

item.title: Headless
item.beer_description: India Pale Ale Brewed with citra hops. DDH with Citra and Mosaic hops. Fermented with hazy chico yeast. Anchorage Brewing Company - Headless

item.title: 9 Years: Circe's Enchantment
item.beer_description: Enchanting, fruity, and full of character. Bursting with pink grapefruit, lollipop, and watermelon, this brew features Talus, Mosaic, Nelson Sauvin, and Superdelic hops. Citrus and red fruit take the lead, with a sweet candy twist. Talus brings bright grapefruit, tropical notes, and hints of rose and pine, while Superdelic layers in bold, candy-like flavors. For a final hit of aroma, Hyperboost—a concentrated hop oil from cutting-edge supercritical extraction—is added post-centrifuge for an extra punch of pungent hop aroma. Smooth, juicy, and spellbinding—let every sip cast its charm. Moersleutel Craft Brewery - 9 Years: Circe's Enchantment
item.beer_style: IPA - Imperial / Double New England / Hazy

item.title: 9 Years: Cyclops Escape
item.beer_description: Cyclops Escape kicks off our new 9 Year Anniversary series with a tropical New England IPA bursting with peach, pear, and juicy stone fruit. Dry-hopped with Peacharine, El Dorado (T90 + Cryo), Citra (Dynaboost + Cryo), and Nelson Sauvin. Expect a vibrant fruit bomb—ripe peach, crisp pear, and a touch of watermelon on a soft, smooth body. Dangerously drinkable. The Cyclops is loose. Escape now—eight more adventures await. Moersleutel Craft Brewery - 9 Years: Cyclops Escape

item.title: 9 Years: Siren Encounter
item.beer_description: Dark, deep, and irresistibly tempting. Siren Encounter is a rich English stout at 8%, triple mashed for maximum body. Brewed with only English ingredients: Bramling Cross hops for an earthy berry note, a range of warm, chocolate malts, and classic Fullers yeast for a smooth, silky mouthfeel. High mash temperatures and slow fermentation keep the beer full-bodied without being overly sweet. Packed with flavors of chocolate, toast, and a hint of berry. Full of character, layered, and surprisingly drinkable. Singing sirens? Odysseus tied himself down. You just take another sip. Moersleutel Craft Brewery - 9 Years: Siren Encounter

item.title: Vilify
item.beer_description: 6th anniversary Sazerac Rye BA imperial stout - 12 months. Brewed and cared for at Bere a la Cluj. Blackout Brewing - Bearface Whisky BA - Too Much Bliss

item.title: Bearface Whisky BA - Too Much Bliss
item.beer_description: Coffee and Dulce de Leche. Aged in Canadian Whisky barrels from Bearface Distillery. Brewed and cared for at Bere a la Cluj. Blackout Brewing - Bearface Whisky BA - Too Much Bliss

item.title: Even More King Queen Knave
item.beer_description: DIPA version of King Queen Knave Citra, Simcoe and Mosaic hops Pressure Drop Brewing - Even More King Queen Knave
item.beer_style: IPA - Imperial / Double New England / Hazy

item.title: Memnu - Barton 1792 BA
item.beer_description: Baklava inspired strong ale with walnuts, almonds, honey and vanilla. Aged for 16 months in a single barrel. Blackout Brewing - Memnu - Barton 1792 BA

item.title: Reflections
item.beer_description: A Hazy DIPA with Nelson Sauvin hops. Reflections is a Hazy DIPA brewed with Nelson Sauvin hops. Five different lots of Nelson from Freestyle Hops and Clayton Hops creates a beautifully complex hop profile using just one variety. I get loads of grapefruit, gooseberries, white wine, passion fruit and some white pepper notes. Head Brewer Jirka Ordén Factory Brewing - Reflections
item.beer_style: IPA - Imperial / Double New England / Hazy

item.title: The Alchemist
item.beer_description: A Hazy IPA with Citra, Motueka & NZ Cascade. We brewed Alchemy some months ago, a collab with Track Brewing. With The Alchemist, I continued with the same base but added NZ Cascade to bring a bit of difference to an already great recipe. Super soft mouthfeel with our banging hop saturation. Citra, Motueka, and NZ Cascade bring all the best fresh, bright fruits to the table. Creamy lime, juicy mango, and refreshing grapefruit are the main aromas I find here. Head Brewer Jirka Ordén Factory Brewing - The Alchemist

item.title: Candydate
item.beer_description: A Hazy Triple IPA with Citra, Galaxy & Vic Secret. When my current colleague Pontus and I were homebrewing, we brewed a banger of a 'House-NEIPA' called Candydate — at least we thought it was amazing back then! So here’s Candydate, brought back with the same hop combo and soul, but a refined malt base, updated to today’s standards. Head Brewer Jirka Ordén Factory Brewing - Candydate

item.title: Taste No Evil
item.beer_description: This Hazy DIPA is bursting with fruity aromas: stone fruits like mango and apricot, grapefruit and passionfruit, some dankness, and a touch of funk and earthiness. The malt base features more wheat than we usually use, and we also used a new yeast with this one. So lots of new things going on, we hope you enjoy this experiment. Head Brewer Jirka Ordén Factory Brewing - Taste No Evil
item.beer_style: IPA - Imperial / Double New England / Hazy

item.title: DDH Alien Church (Citra & Galaxy)
item.beer_description: DDH Alien Church is the intensely amplified & totally fuzzed out iteration of our Reptoid Alien with Photosynthesizing Tongue Oat IPA. Brewed with the same fluffy malted oats as always, and hopped, again as always! super aggressively with Cascade and Columbus. Dry hopped first with the same huge dose of the choicest Citra, Mosaic, and Chinook we’ve come to love and then blasted over the skull with the heaviest of hands with a mountain of even more Citra and additional tropical & punchy & hyper fresh Galaxy for the secondary dry hopping. We hope you enjoy this one as much as you’ve come to enjoy Alien Church over the last several years =) Tired Hands Brewing Company - DDH Alien Church (Citra & Galaxy)

item.title: Pass A Good Time
item.beer_description: Bourbon barrel-aged imperial stout with cocoa powder, powdered sugar, vanilla, and milk sugar Nothing says Mardi Gras like a chocolate-covered beignet, which is exactly what we set out to recreate with this Fat Twosday descendant. This blend of top-shelf imperial stouts—Black Tuesday with just the right blend of imperial milk stouts—was treated with cocoa powder and powdered sugar with a touch of vanilla and milk sugar for sweetness. The Bruery - Pass A Good Time

item.title: Tillage
item.beer_description: This DIPA is brewed with pilsner malt, flaked oats, and an absurd amount of unmalted wheat. Hopped aggressively in the kettle with the favorites Citra and Mosaic. Then we double dry hopped this murky DIPA with almost all Nelson. We are tasting white grape juice, fresh Georgia peaches, and frothy cream. The Drowned Lands Brewery - Tillage
item.beer_style: IPA - Imperial / Double New England / Hazy

item.title: Milkshake IPA (Strawberry)
item.beer_description: Brewed at Tired Hands Brewing Company, an IPA brewed with oats and lactose sugar. Fermented atop strawberries (a high pectin fruit) and vanilla beans. Hopped intensely with Mosaic and Citra. We also added wheat flour and 50 lbs of local apples (a high pectin fruit) to the boil. Brewed in collaboration with Omnipollo. Tired Hands Brewing Company - Milkshake IPA (Strawberry)

item.title: Vitamin Sea - Due North
item.beer_description: Hazy IPA hopped with Galaxy and Mosaic Vitamin Sea Brewing - Due North

item.title: Be Kind, Rewind
item.beer_description: Because Beer is Better with Friends, Be Kind, Rewind is a collab with our Carolina friends Leah & JT of @replaybrewing & Carly & Nick of @funguysbrewing . This Triple New England was hopped with Citra, Nectaron and HBC 638. We timed this release so that we could have it ready to pour along side our friends at @yah_brew_mountjoy 90’s inspired beer fest this weekend, Fresh Brews in Pennsylvania. . Tin Barn Brewing - Be Kind, Rewind

item.title: Aspect Oriented
item.beer_description: Super fluffy and creamy DIPA hopped with Citra, Motueka and Galaxy. Spyglass Brewing Company - Aspect Oriented
item.beer_style: IPA - Imperial / Double New England / Hazy

item.title: Double Double Mash
item.beer_description: Double Bourbon Barrel-Aged Barleywine Ale Double Double Mash is a double barrel-aged barleywine ale that packs double the indulgence. Aged first in Buffalo Trace bourbon barrels, then Heaven Hill bourbon barrels for another year, it offers rich aromas of oak, vanilla and fig. The velvety caramel toast and fig jam flavors mingle with charred vanilla notes. The journey concludes with a mildly sweet and clean finish, a testament to refined craftsmanship. The Bruery - Double Double Mash

item.title: Vitamin Sea - Just Another T-Shirt Shop
item.beer_description: Our flagship Hazy IPA. This one has intense aromas of tropical fruits, citrus, passionfruit and peach flavors. This combination of hops has a flavor profile bursting with ripe pineapple, mango, and papaya along with a bright citrus punch from the Citra hops. Vitamin Sea Brewing - Just Another T-Shirt Shop

item.title: Terra Mosaic
item.beer_description: Triple IPA brewed with pilsner malt, malted white wheat, flaked and malted oats. Hopped solely with Mosaic through the whirlpool and dry hop at the same rate as Terra Citra. We're tasting dank blueberries, drippy, overripe peach, spicy dried orange rind, papaya, mango, and a big ol' mouthful of zebra stripe gum. The Drowned Lands Brewery - Terra Mosaic

item.title: Vitamin Sea - Double Spring
item.beer_description: DIPA hopped with Galaxy, Cascade and Columbus Vitamin Sea Brewing - Double Spring
item.beer_style: IPA - Imperial / Double New England / Hazy

item.title: Baby G.O.A.T.
item.beer_description: Introducing the newest in our Baby Animal Series - Baby G.O.A.T! This single New England IPA was hopped with Citra, Bru-1, and Motueka to create a juicy pineapple bomb that is the Greatest of All Time! Tin Barn Brewing - Baby G.O.A.T.

item.title: Heavenly Blis
item.beer_description: Double Barrel-Aged Imperial Stout finished in Bourbon Maple Syrup Barrels The Bruery - Heavenly Blis

item.title: Mosaic Monster
item.beer_description: This hazy beast of a Double New England IPA is double dry-hopped with an unruly dose of Mosaic and Citra. This juicy titan unleashes an explosive bouquet of mango, candied orange peel, and dank tropical haze to tame the monster within. It’s dangerously drinkable — unleash with caution. Tin Barn Brewing - Mosaic Monster
item.beer_style: IPA - Imperial / Double New England / Hazy

item.title: Tiny Esses
item.beer_description: Sour ale with Skittles Prairie Artisan Ales - Tiny Esses

item.title: Patron
item.beer_description: Voici notre dernière triple NEIPA intensément houblonnée aux cultivars Nectaron, Nelson Sauvin Cryo, Nelson Sauvin Subzero Hop Kief et Citra. Une bombe tropicale avec des notes de fruit de la passion, de nectarine bien mûre et une pointe de sauvignon blanc. Le tout porté par une texture soyeuse et une finale fraîche qui en redemande malgré son pourcentage élevé Nano Cinco - Patron

item.title: Kung Fu Time Bomb
item.beer_description: In collaboration with Incandescent Brewing. A DIPA hopped with Citra Incognito, Krush, Citra, Motueka, and Strata Quantum Brite. Spyglass Brewing Company - Kung Fu Time Bomb
item.beer_style: IPA - Imperial / Double New England / Hazy

item.title: Bain D'agrumes
item.beer_description: Bain d'agrumes est une New England IPA dans laquelle nous avons poussé l’expérience Citra à fond : Citra T90 en pellets (Coleman Agriculture) Citra Dynaboost (Yakima Chief) à chaud Citra Spectrum (John I. Haas) à froid Et pour encore plus de peps, on a ajouté à chaud des écorces d’orange amère et des tranches d’orange sanguine. Résultat ? Une bombe d’agrumes ultra juteuse, avec des notes éclatantes de citron, de pamplemousse et surtout des notes explosives d'orange. Un vrai jus d’orange houblonné ! Nano Cinco - Bain D'agrumes

item.title: Cinco
item.beer_description: Cinco est une Double New England IPA houblonnée aux variétés Nelson Sauvin, HBC 1019 et Peacharine. Elle offre un corps soyeux et une explosion d’arômes de pêche, de nectarine et de fruits à noyau bien mûrs. Cinco, ce n’est pas seulement le nom de la bière, c’est aussi celui du chien de Mathieu, maître brasseur et co-fondateur de la brasserie. C’est lui, Cinco, qui a inspiré le nom même de la brasserie il y a de cela quasiment 10 ans, alors que nous n'étions qu'une gang d'amis à brasser de la bière pour la plaisir dans l'appartement de Mathieu. Un nom qui est resté! Un compagnon fidèle, curieux et qui était toujours dans nos pattes pendant les brassins Nano Cinco - Cinco
item.beer_style: IPA - Imperial / Double New England / Hazy

item.title: Prickle Kitty
item.beer_description: Double IPA with Simcoe, Sabro, and El Dorado. Willibald Farm Brewery - Prickle Kitty
item.beer_style: IPA - Imperial / Double New England / Hazy

item.title: Hello My Name Is - Vanille
item.beer_description: Stout impérial vieilli en barrique de whisky rye ayant contenu du sirop d'érable, puis conditionné sur de la vanille du Mexique. Une bière particulièrement riche et sirupeuse aux notes de sirop d'érable, de vanille, de cacao et de spiritueux. Nano Cinco - Hello My Name Is - Vanille

item.title: Refreshing
item.beer_description: Refreshing is our late summer months, forget-about-the-impending-cold, always refreshing Thirst Quencher Double IPA! Brewed with heaps of malted oats and intensely refreshingly hopped and dry hopped with Galaxy, Citra, and Lemondrop! Lots of key lime, drippy sweet mango, and kalamansi gumballs in this batch. It’s just real pungent, drippy sappy juicy, and well... Refreshing! 8.0% abv. Tired Hands Brewing Company - Refreshing

item.title: Bomb!
item.beer_description: Bomb! is an imperial stout aged on Spaceship Earth espresso beans, chocolate, vanilla beans, and ancho chile peppers. All the flavors meld to create a truly unique beer. The peppers add just the right amount of heat to complement the intense coffee and chocolate flavors. Prairie Artisan Ales - Bomb!

item.title: Dock 73 - NELSON SAUVIN, CITRA & SOUTHERN CROSS (2025)
item.beer_description: TRIPLE NEW ENGLAND IPA AU MIEL. HOUBLONS: NELSON SAUVIN, CITRA & SOUTHERN CROSS Le Ketch - Dock 73 - NELSON SAUVIN, CITRA & SOUTHERN CROSS (2025)

item.title: Aspect of Taurus
item.beer_description: Citra, Lorien & Sabro-hopped Double India Pale Ale Hop Butcher For The World - Aspect of Taurus
item.beer_style: IPA - Imperial / Double New England / Hazy

item.title: Hydra | Apricot + Mango + Raspberry
item.beer_description: This Fruited Sour blends apricot, mango, and raspberry to form just one of this monster’s many heads. Keep your eyes peeled for even more flavor combinations. Mortalis Brewing Company - Hydra | Apricot + Mango + Raspberry

item.title: Hydra | Push Pop
item.beer_description: This Fruited Smoothie Sour was brewed in collaboration with Yah Brew. We blended Banana, Strawberry, Cantaloupe, and marshmallow to form just one of this monster’s many heads. A little taste of 90’s nostalgia while you keep your eyes peeled for even more flavor combinations. Mortalis Brewing Company - Hydra | Push Pop

item.title: Abandon The Halogens (2022)
item.beer_description: Imperial Stout brewed with honey and lactose and aged in bourbon barrels Jackie O’s Brewery - Abandon The Halogens (2022)

item.title: Dora #79
item.beer_description: Dora is our exploratory series of beers where we mess around with anything/everything from ingredients to process. For this version of Dora we decided we wanted to try a new blend of pale oats and wheat than we typically use. Hopped exclusively with Citra, we taste huge pineapple, papaya and mixed citrus Badlands Brewing Company - Dora #79

item.title: Dock 111 - Citra, Cascade NZ, Motueka & Pacifica
item.beer_description: NEW ENGLAND IPA AU MIEL. HOUBLONS: CITRA, CASCADE NZ, MOTUEKA & PACIFICA Le Ketch - Dock 111 - Citra, Cascade NZ, Motueka & Pacifica

item.title: The Juice Awakens
item.beer_description: In a galaxy not so far away, the haze is thick, and the juice awakens in the power of our new collaboration with @greatnotion. The Juice Awakens (DIPA) is the beginning of a delicious rebellion using an incredible blend of some of our favorite hop varieties with a hop bill of Citra Incognito, Citra Lupomax, Citra, Strata, Eclipse, and Krush. Bursting with navel orange and lemon-lime spritz aromas, expect a tropical flavor force of pineapple, orange, and ruby red grapefruit with assorted tropical berry Pez, dank candied orange peel, and saturated mango key lime smoothie. A textured mouthfeel loaded with rainbow melon builds up with a force of hoppiness and a custard-like finish. Equilibrium Brewery - The Juice Awakens
item.beer_style: IPA - Imperial / Double New England / Hazy

item.title: 6 Lives
item.beer_description: IPA brewed in continuation with our anniversary (aka this year’s “Anniversary Series”). 7.5% Long Live Beerworks - 6 Lives

item.title: Double Drip (Motueka, Rakau, Peacharine, Southern Cross Hop Kief)
item.beer_description: Hazy Double IPA w/ Motueka, Rakau, Peacharine & Southern Cross SubZero Hop Kief A full pillowy mouthfeel delivering a wave of fresh peach, lychee, orange, guava, nectarine and lime zest. Counterpart Brewing - Double Drip (Motueka, Rakau, Peacharine, Southern Cross Hop Kief)
item.beer_style: IPA - Imperial / Double New England / Hazy

item.title: Bourbon Barrel Black Maple (2025)
item.beer_description: Black Maple features a diverse grist of barley, wheat, chocolate malt, caramel malt, and a pinch of smoked malt. Locally harvested maple syrup was added in the boil kettle before aging in bourbon barrels. A long time brewery favorite! This batch aged in bourbon barrels for 24 months and was conditioned on an extra addition of local maple syrup post barrels. Jackie O’s Brewery - Bourbon Barrel Black Maple (2025)

item.title: Braaaaaaaains - Billions of Peaches
item.beer_description: Billions of Peaches Braaaaaaaains is loaded up with three commas worth of peaches, more peaches, a few more peaches, apricot and some more apricot. Then we hit it with our double secret smoothie treatment of sea salt, lactose and vanilla beans. Drekker Brewing Company - Braaaaaaaains - Billions of Peaches

item.title: Dock 72 - Peacharine, Galaxy & Nelson Sauvin (2025)
item.beer_description: DOUBLE NEW ENGLAND IPA AU MIEL. HOUBLONS: PEACHARINE, GALAXY & NELSON SAUVIN Le Ketch - Dock 72 - Peacharine, Galaxy & Nelson Sauvin (2025)
item.beer_style: IPA - Imperial / Double New England / Hazy

item.title: Vanilla Coffee Bourbon Barrel Dark Apparition (2025)
item.beer_description: Seven malts were used to create deep flavors of coffee, chocolate, caramel, and molasses. A hint of bitterness and herbal character from carefully selected European and American hops help support the monolithic maltiness. This special batch was aged in bourbon barrels and conditioned on Malagasy vanilla beans and whole Thunderkiss espresso beans. This year’s vintage of Vanilla Coffee Bourbon Barrel Dark Apparition was aged in select Wild Turkey, Knob Creek and Willett barrels ranging from 13 to 26 months and conditioned on the Thuderkiss Espresso Blend and a blend of Tahitian and Madagascar vanilla beans. Jackie O’s Brewery - Vanilla Coffee Bourbon Barrel Dark Apparition (2025)

item.title: Churro Puffs
item.beer_description: Cinnamon sugar with a warm, soft, and doughy center, make Churros the perfect inspiration for our newest dessert-inspired stout. Churro Puffs take our base imperial stout recipe and add toasted almond, marshmallow, and a light addition of cinnamon. Pitch black with a frothy cap, we get aromas of early mornings at the bake shop, chocolate-covered almond bars, and a touch of sweet cinnamon. A rich and velvety brownie batter-like foundation is laced with flavors of toasted almond, marshmallow-stuffed cinnamon donut holes, and sugar cookie dough. The balanced addition of cinnamon complements the flavors, gently checking all the boxes for liquid culinary bliss. Equilibrium Brewery - Churro Puffs

item.title: Des Bonnes Gouttes
item.beer_description: Double IPA - Citra, Citra Cryo, Citra Dynaboost, Citra Hyperboost, Motueka Messorem - Des Bonnes Gouttes
item.beer_style: IPA - Imperial / Double New England / Hazy

item.title: COCO PALMER HOUSE
item.beer_description: Cette Brownie Pastry Stout a été brassée avec du chocolat, noix de Grenoble, vanille et noix de coco. BreWskey - COCO PALMER HOUSE

item.title: Shoot To Thrill
item.beer_description: Hazy Triple IPA w/ Freestyle Mega Terps: Motueka, Southern Cross, Rakau & Phantasm brewed in collaboration w/ Blood Brothers Brewing A full creamy mouthfeel and juice-like sweetness carrying a melange of guava, lychee, lemon candy, nectarine, papaya and sauvignon blanc. Counterpart Brewing - Shoot To Thrill

item.title: NZ GOLD
item.beer_description: TIPA collab Freestyle Hops x Eggers Hops x NZ Hops. Eggers Nelson Sauvin, Eggers Rakau, NZ Rakau, NZ Superdelic, Freestyle Motueka, Freestyle Motueka Hop Kief BreWskey - NZ GOLD

item.title: Straight Outta The Laboratory
item.beer_description: We love science and we have been feverishly working in the lab to bring you our most recent achievements. We started with the Straight Outta Middletown grain bill, supersized the citra portion, applied our latest and greatest technology (think of the EQ juice in raining belma and last batch of MC²) and ended up with January Fluctuation on steroids with the most amount of EQ juice to date. Straight Outta The Laboratory pours a hazy bright tangerine and has aromas of freshly squeezed citrus, lime, grapefruit, and a tropical character that makes actual tropical fruit green with envy. The flavor is explosive with notes of bright tropical orange juice, mango smoothie, and dank grass. It’s resinous and chewy with an escalating brightness and a just a touch of residual sweetness balanced by a soft bitterness. We are particularly proud of this beer as it’s the culmination of months and months of hard work (since January Fluctuation). Equilibrium Brewery - Straight Outta The Laboratory

item.title: INVOCATION
item.beer_description: DIPA Citra, Nelson Sauvin, Simcoe BreWskey - INVOCATION
item.beer_style: IPA - Imperial / Double New England / Hazy

item.title: MC3PO
item.beer_description: Brewed in collaboration with Great Notion Deep in the dark lab, two legendary forces collide to study all things science. Whether it’s mass-energy equivalence of a neutron star, trying to survive another council meeting on Coruscant, or creating the newest IPA, MC3PO is there. With a space-time-bending mix of hops to keep the droid in you satisfied, MC3PO starts off with a 2-row and white wheat base before a Mosaic Incognito, Mosaic Lupomax, Mosaic, Strata, and Amarillo hop bill to keep all your taste bud circuits firing. Smooth and bright flavors of pineapple and mango meet bright citrus with a touch of lime and a complex, dank earthiness and a touch of resinous bitterness. Equilibrium Brewery - MC3PO

item.title: Gypsy Outpost - Coconut, Vanilla Beans, Cocoa Nibs and Cinnamon
item.beer_description: This variant of Gypsy Outpost celebrates the delicious flavors within our favorite Girl Scout Cookie. We brew a thick, rich, chocolaty base beer before conditioning upon heaps of toasted coconut, vanilla beans, cocoa nibs and cinnamon. Sip this pastry porter with your friends reminiscing about youthful adventures in the deep woods. Humble Forager Brewery - Gypsy Outpost - Coconut, Vanilla Beans, Cocoa Nibs and Cinnamon

item.title: Demoliri 0001
item.beer_description: IPA - Motueka, Riwaka, Citra Dynaboost Messorem - Demoliri 0001

item.title: Goose Island - Tusk & Feather
item.beer_description: Double Barrel Aged Barleywine collaboration with More Brewing Goose Island Beer Co. - Tusk & Feather

item.title: NECROSYNTH (Ghost NECROSYNTH)
item.beer_description: We have never brewed a Quadruple Hazy before, but when our new friends from P.I.G.S. Brew Co. flew over from Greece we figured we should brew something epic! And what is more epic than a 11.5% Quadruple Hazy. Answer. Nothing! BOOM. Fellow metalheads collaborating on a HEAVY beer that checks all boxes! A two-part collaboration with sister-beer NECROPUNK. Adroit Theory - NECROSYNTH (Ghost NECROSYNTH)

item.title: Strange Philosophies 112
item.beer_description: This Double IPA is part of our exploration series. Too often, we become complacent and forget to push the boundaries and search the unending hop combinations to find a stroke of genius. Time to get back to class! This version features Freestyle Nelson and Freestyle Nelson Subzero Hop Kief. Cheers! Mortalis Brewing Company - Strange Philosophies 112
item.beer_style: IPA - Imperial / Double New England / Hazy

item.title: BB Kush - 2025
item.beer_description: Citra, Superdelic, Terpenes - Collab with Blood Brothers All My Friends Beer Co. - BB Kush - 2025
item.beer_style: IPA - Imperial / Double New England / Hazy

item.title: The World Is Mine
item.beer_description: Hazy IPA w/ Motueka, Waimea & Riwaka Bright and juicy, brimming with fresh mango, lychee, nectarine and white gummy bears with a lush, creamy mouthfeel. Counterpart Brewing - The World Is Mine

item.title: SEVER
item.beer_description: Brownies, Cacao, Terpenes - Collab with Third Moon All My Friends Beer Co. - SEVER

item.title: Oh No
item.beer_description: Anchorage Brewing Company - Oh No

item.title: Chemistry
item.beer_description: Citra, Motueka, Rakau, Terpenes - Collab with BAOS Podcast All My Friends Beer Co. - Chemistry

item.title: Sensescape (2025)
item.beer_description: The return of one of our all time favorite hop blends! SenseScape is a made up word that we think does a good job of encompassing the entirety of your various senses. Smell, see, taste, feel. The ultimate package for perceiving the world around you. This beer was designed to satiate all of them at once, which is why we hopped it with arguably our favorite blend of hops: Citra, Galaxy, and Nelson Sauvin. Built on a cloud like malt base, we taste notes of papaya, tangerine flesh, candied peaches and rich tropical fruit. Badlands Brewing Company - Sensescape (2025)

item.title: All That I Have Learned (Ghost 1587)
item.beer_description: We originally made this beer in the spring of 2021 + to say it was highly sought after would be, well, an understatement. A continuation of our recent concepts in Confessions, this one is as perfect a stout as we can craft. This high gravity stout is masterfully crafted to balance aromas and flavors of dark chocolate, caramel, and coffee with a subtle underlying booziness. Full bodied and slightly roasty.⁠ Adroit Theory - All That I Have Learned (Ghost 1587)

item.title: Bizarre Celebrations: Cloud 9
item.beer_description: In the mash, a nice blend of wheat and oats creates a silky body with subtle sweetness. The yeast imparts a delicate fruitiness that perfectly complements the complex hop profile. Utilizing a touch of Phantasm powder on the hot side, and dry-hopped with an all-New Zealand blend of Peacharine, Nectaron, and The Bruce, this beer bursts with vibrant tropical notes. Expect juicy peach and apricot, followed by hints of pineapple and citrus zest, with an intense expression of passionfruit and a crisp, clean finish. Foam Brewers - Bizarre Celebrations: Cloud 9

item.title: Bank Hotel
item.beer_description: India Pale Ale aux houblons Sabro & Citra Brasserie du Bas-Canada - Bank Hotel

item.title: Melody
item.beer_description: Dry hopped IPA with Citra, Motueka & Galaxy. FUERST WIACEK Berlin - Melody

item.title: I See You
item.beer_description: This Double IPA features YCH Simcoe hops, along with Simcoe Cryo and Hyperboost, as well as El Dorado T90. - Sudden Death Brewing Co. - I See You
item.beer_style: IPA - Imperial / Double New England / Hazy

item.title: Dread Moon Cove
item.beer_description: Dread Moon Cove bathed in a whopping 7 kg of Madagascan and Tahitian vanilla and played with raw and toasted coconut. The result is an intense and well-rounded stout where every addition is noticeable, helping to make the beer our best stout yet! Enjoy! - Sudden Death Brewing Co. - Dread Moon Cove

item.title: Doggo´s Delight

item.beer_description: - Arpus Brewing Co. - Arpus X Brasserie Popihn Imperial Cascadian Dark Ale

item.title: Caribbean Chocolate Cake: Chocolate Orange Tiramisu
item.beer_description: A Caribbean Chocolate Cake special inspired by rich, decadent tiramasu. Picture biscuits doused in espresso and orange liqueur, cream and marscapone whipped with melted chocolate, topped by a generous dusting of cocoa powder. -

item.beer_description: Citra, El Dorado, Simcoe - White Dog Brewery - Not Afraid of Storms

item.title: Night Shift Vintage 2024 - Russian Imperial Stout Aged In Tennessee Whiskey Barrels
item.beer_description: Back to our 2016 roots, this 2024 batch is aged in Tennessee Whiskey barrels. No spices, just the barrels, malt, and hops. Aged for 2 years. -

item.title: X Anniversary 5/10 Pastry Sour
item.beer_description: X Anniversary 5/10 Pastry Sour - fifth in a series of anniversary beers brewed in collaboration with friends from Tripping Animals. Loaded with mango and blueberry, balanced by cherry and orange, this beer offers a broad spectrum of fruitiness. The addition of marshmallow and vanilla rounds out the sweetness of this vibrant composition. Using the classic kettle souring method, also favored by the collaborators, it is fermented with a traditional fruity yeast strain. Result is a nectar with a high sweetness and plenty of fun in every sip. -

item.title: X Anniversary 6/10 Quadrupel BBA
item.beer_description: X Anniversary 6/10 Quadrupel BBA - sixth in a series of anniversary beers. Quadrupel, brewed with extract of 30° Plato, features a milt profile composed of Pilsner and caramel malts. Fermented with a Belgian yeast strain, it offers aromas of dark fruits and subtle spicy notes. Aged for 18 months in Jack Daniel's barrels, it was infused before bottling with almonds, hazelnuts, and pecans. The result is a Quadrupel characterized by caramel and toasted flavors, complemented by notes of dried dark fruits. Barrel aging adds layers of vanilla, coconut, and refined alcohol warmth, while the nut blend creates an intriguing and harmonious finish. -

item.title: Double Winterseed
item.beer_description: Double Winterseed is an 8% Double IPA brewed with oats and hopped with Mosaic and Talus. We love to end the winter with this recipe but have only done the single IPA version before today. We've doubled down on the Mosaic and Talus hops to bring you the DIPA version for the first time ever and it is tasting fantastic! We get notes of creamy tangerine in this crusher. - Third Moon Brewing Company - Double Winterseed
item.beer_style: IPA - Imperial / Double New England / Hazy

item.beer_description: Citra, Mosaic, HBC586 (krush) - White Dog Brewery - Razor Thin Margins

item.title: Caribbean Chocolate Cake: Rocky Road Brownie
item.beer_description: Rocky Road is the influence for this fun and flavourful Caribbean Chocolate Cake. It's dense and fudgy, with sprinklings of marshmallows, honeycomb and biscuits. Made with the help of our special guests, Vault City. NOT SUITABLE FOR VEGETARIANS -

item.title: Death By Caribbean Chocolate Christmas Cake
item.beer_description: A very special festive surprise from the Siren brew team, Death By CCC is getting the Christmas cake treatment! We've spun the decadent base beer with orange zest, tonka bean, almond extract and a blend of warming spices. Strictly limited edition. -

item.title: Shedding Skin
item.beer_description: Shedding Skin DDH India Pale Ale - 6,0% Bold, smooth, and flavourful, this hazy single was double dry hopped with Mosaic (DynaBoost, T-90), Chinook. Berries, kush, pine. - Sudden Death Brewing Co. - Shedding Skin

item.title: Ghost-Fu!
item.beer_description: If crafting hazy IPAs were martial arts, our latest collab with @NorthPark represents a twirling 360 drop kick. Presenting: Ghost-Fu! Over the years we’ve become good friends, hanging out at beer fests across the globe, and now we’ve finally teamed up with these IPA legends to brew a rad West Coast DIPA using some of the processes and procedures they do in San Diego! North Park’s Hop-Fu! is their quintessential West Coast IPA that we’ve used as a starting point for Ghost-Fu! Dosed heavily with Simcoe Dynaboost and dry-hopped with Citra, Mosaic, and Amarillo, it packs the familiar juicy punch of Ghost in the Machine but isn’t hazy and drinks smooth for a Double IPA. Hii-yah! - Parish Brewing Co. - Ghost-Fu!

item.title: Thistle Dew
item.beer_description: West coast IPA. Cascade, Centennial ans Simcoe hops. - Wood Brothers Brewing Co. - Thistle Dew

item.title: Faire Le Vide
item.beer_description: Faire le Vide. Prendre une grande respire. Souffer un peu. C'est l'idée de cette belle double IPA brassée en collaboration avec Hops Connect Canada et houblonnée à 100% avec leur variété de Galaxy. Sous sa belle robe jaune, de doux esters de fruits de la passion, d'ananas mûrs et de goyaves se suivent et se délient sur votre palais en une relaxante danse. Laissez-vous bercer par cette belle DIPA bien onctueuse et vous aurez vous aussi droit au repos du vide. - Brasserie Sir John Brewing Co. - Faire Le Vide
item.beer_style: IPA - Imperial / Double New England / Hazy

item.title: D'Rye 2024
item.beer_description: Mixed-fermented rye ale, continuation of the cask series. Half of the Amalgam blend. Released in 2024. -

item.title: 60KG Strata
item.beer_description: Our new Single Hop NEIPA series focuses on single-varietal varieties. In this edition, 60kg of dry-hopped Strata delivers an explosion of stone fruit, grapefruit, and a touch of fresh herbs. It's all rounded out by a silky, crisp body. -

item.title: Insight
item.beer_description: In 1977, a pastry chef from Brittany, Henri le Roux, came up with the idea of making caramel with the addition of local sea salt. And it was just an insight. Judge for yourself, could we resist and not combine two wonderful flavors? Velvet imperial stout, chocolate notes, a little coffee and biscuit plus delicious salted caramel? -

item.title: NAWI
item.beer_description: This hazy has a beautiful complexity to it as a result of the vibrant blend of Mosaic, Eclipse and Idaho 7. Mosaic delivers a mango and pine one-two which is brightened up by the orange zest of Eclispe while Idaho 7 ties it all together with juicy pineapple and apricot with a hint of lemon. At an easier 6% abv, this is an incredibly drinkable IPA that delivers a hit for all of those hop addicts. -

item.title: 60KG Cashmere
item.beer_description: Our new Single Hop NEIPA series focuses on single-varietal wines. In this edition, 60kg of dry-hopped Cashmere delivers a burst of melon and citrus with a smooth coconut finish. It's all rounded out by a silky, fresh body. -

item.title: 30,000 Steps
item.beer_description: The pineapple is one of the most elbow-throwing fruits in the world when it comes to assertive flavours and acidity. It doesn’t wait in line, ask for directions, or care what you think. In fact, pineapples are kind of assholes. If you’ve ever experienced the joys of carving one up, you understand even better. Our challenge with this blend was to crush the spirit of the pineapple in order to have it behave like a decent member of fruit society. Balance was the goal of this blend. Fruiting rates are not one size-fits-all, so an understanding of the target pineapple profile was key for us. Despite the general constitution of the pineapple it does have many great qualities. The flavour comes from the chemical compound Ethyl Butyrate, which is a commonly occurring ester in nature. Bright like the sun, it’s best enjoyed in pleasurable doses, as over indulging burns. We feel the intensity and level we achieved in this blend is on the mark. In the end, we made a new friend in pineapple. -

item.title: Love Potion
item.beer_description: Our second collab with the Sisters A. Chocolate brand: a rich double milk stout with strawberries, organic vanilla and Peruvian cacaovella. This is a smooth, delicate and creamy chocolate stout, with notes of ripe berries. -

item.title: Blame Culture
item.beer_description: NEIPA is bursting with tropical flavors, the result of a thorough dry-hop blend of Galaxy, Mosaic, and Ekuanot hops. Highlighting notes of passion fruit, pineapple, and citrus, it offers a smooth, refreshing, and easy-drinking experience, perfect for guilt-free enjoyment. -

item.title: TDH Riwaka X Galaxy DIPA
item.beer_description: Hazy Double IPA hopped with Riwaka and Galaxy -
item.beer_style: IPA - Imperial / Double New England / Hazy

item.title: More Than Amber (Cellar Series)
item.beer_description: Een rijke en fluweelzachte imperial porter, twee jaar gerijpt op cognacvaten. -

item.title: The 4 Elements: Fire
item.beer_description: Fire is a non-adjunct stout we’re particularly proud of, brewed in collaboration with Crisp Malt. We were given the privilege of using two of their heritage malts in this 100% English stout. Chevallier® Heritage Malt, grown since 1820 and the dominant barley in England until the 1920s, is the backbone of many Victorian ales. It brings deep flavours, robust maltiness and a rich marmalade-like character. Then there’s Plumage Archer® Malt, the first commercially produced crossbred barley, which had a similar impact on brewing as Chevallier. For years they stood side by side, each adding their own nuance to 20th century British beers. Our brewers love the subtle flavour and clean finish of Plumage Archer. In this brew, both malts are used in equal parts. We’ve also added Bramling Cross hops, which give notes of blackberry, spice and wood, and East Kent Goldings hops, which are earthy and slightly bitter, but also have a hint of honey. This beer is quadruple mashed to extract the most flavour from these special ingredients. The result? Clean, thick and robust. Cheers! -

item.title: Through the Ages: A Concept of Linearity (Bourbon Barrel Coconut 2023 Edition)
item.beer_description: Imperial Stout aged in Bourbon barrels for 17 months and conditioned on coconut flakes. -

item.title: Starfield Project (PULP • w. Vault City)
item.beer_description: Raspberry Whipped Cream And Honey Cranachan PULP! Collaboration with our great buddies from Vault City Brewing in Edinburgh! Flip can to mix, this beer contains high levels of fruit that may settle in the can! After mixing, let the can rest for a few minutes to avoid foaming from the can. Store cold! This beer is NOT vegan. -

item.title: Hollow Names
item.beer_description: DIPA with Mosaic BBC and Amarillo BBC.

item.title: Planet 2 (PULP)
item.beer_description: Strawberry Banana Raspberry Thickshake PULP! We’re back with a new thickshake! Continuing with creamy and sweet banana, we paired this one with the freshest strawberries and raspberries. Pours thick and creamy as you would except! Loads and loads of banana from start to finish with bright strawberries merged seamlessly throughout… we added a dose of raspberries to provide some tangyness and complexity to the mix. They also provide a beautiful color. Very cool combination of flavors if you ask us, subtle and gentle in company, but also very powerful! Flip can to mix, this beer contains high levels of fruit that may settle in the can! After mixing, let the can rest for a few minutes to avoid foaming from the can. Store cold! This beer is vegan. -

item.beer_description: A vinous imperial Baltic porter aged in Tawny port wine casks for 22 months. -

item.title: Ārpus X Factory Quintuple Dry Hopped Motueka X Nelson Sauvin QIPA

Motueka brings bright lime zest and tropical fruit, while Nelson Sauvin delivers intense white grape, gooseberry, and dank complexity. Thick, juicy, and bursting with hops – this is big, bold, and unforgettable! -

OMNIPOLLO®️ x ALESMITH®️ x SIERRA NEVADA®️ x FIRESTONE WALKER®️ x CELLARMAKER®️ x HOP BUTCHER FOR THE WORLD®️ x ELECTRIC BREWING®️ x WILLOW PARK BREWING®️ THREE TIMES THREE™️ DOUBLE IPA (8,2%). item.beer_description: Imperial Stout with Cacao Nibs, Roasted Peanuts, Sea Salt, and Coffee. We’ve transformed our classic Speedway Stout into a decadent peanut butter cup-inspired treat. Roasted peanuts blend with rich chocolate malts, bold coffee, and Dominican cacao nibs. The result is a perfect balance of salty, roasty peanuts and rich, decadent chocolate. Subtle sweetness, warming alcohol, and smooth chocolate create a well-rounded sip. -

item.title: Barrel-Aged Speedway Stout: Vanilla Shake (2024)
item.beer_description: This Barrel-Aged blend of Speedway Stout and Beer Geek Vanilla Shake has been aged in Premium Bourbon barrels with the addition of locally roasted coffee and three varieties of vanilla beans. Each sip transports your taste buds to a world of silky smoothness, where the bold flavors of coffee and vanilla dance harmoniously with the subtle hints of sweet bourbon. Mikkeller collab. -

item.title: Moist Green Organic
item.beer_description: 'Moist Green Organic' is an Unfiltered double dry-hopped IPA brewed with a delicate base of flaked oats, white wheat, honey malt, and a heavy whirlpool addition of Kohatu. With multiple dry hop additions of Motueka, Riwaka, Waimea, and Ekuanot, I can smell the colors outside on my lawn. 'I get so overwhelmed by olfactory hues.' Think tropical green starburst, orange skittles, and fresh squeezed clementine juice. -

item.title: Coule
item.beer_description: New England IPA that highlights a trio of varieties that have helped cement the style in the brewing world: Citra, Mosaic and Simcoe, with a touch of Idaho 7. The concept was to use the Holy Trinity of hops of American origin, use them in different forms and work with modern hopping techniques. The result is an explosive NEIPA saturated with hops, yet retaining its juicy and balanced appearance. We note grapefruit, orange juice, bubble gum and tropical fruits, balanced by a resinous and slightly « dank » side. -

item.beer_description: Citra, HBC 586, NZ Cascade and NZ Cascade Hop Kief -

item.beer_description: American Barleywine ale aged in used bourbon barrels. This one was aged 3 years in barrels. -

item.title: Steak And Eggs
item.beer_description: Steak and Eggs is an Unfiltered New Zealand DIPA brewed with a protein-rich base of flaked oats, flaked wheat, and white wheat. Being a medium-rare member of NZ Hops 'Bract Brewer Program,' we hopped this juicy steak exclusively with NZ-101. These trials help shape the future of commercial hop production in New Zealand. Think hearty breakfast from Denny's, Cracker Barrel, and Bob Evans. -
item.beer_style: IPA - Imperial / Double New England / Hazy

item.beer_description: This signature DIPA of ours features Mosaic, Strata, and El Dorado in the dry hop and pours pale gold with heavy haze. The aroma features big melon vibes on the nose, honeydew, cantaloupe, strawberry, wild flowers, rose water, fresh cut grass, and a hint of orange. The flavor follows the aroma with melon, strawberry, and flowers. -

item.beer_description: Mr. Drekker welcomes a brand new 100% Mosaic Double IPA that's just exploding with flavor. Built on a base of Golden Promise, oats, & spelt, with huge bursts of mango, citrus & stone fruit, this one is locked and loaded with enough Mosaic to doom us all. So, uhh, sorry, but what a way to go! -

item.title: Window of Opportunity

Aromas of Nutella and Fluff lead into big flavors of Hershey syrup, coconut snowballs, vanilla caramel macchiato, and graham crackers. This beer is the liquid version of Mallomar dipped in sweet coconut flakes with a silky decadent finish. -

item.beer_description: IPA - Mosaic, Galaxy, Nectaron, Citra, Citra Incognito - Messorem - Ruse Et Entete

item.title: From Underneath (2025)
item.beer_description: From Underneath is our 10% ABV chocolate porter which is brewed with a rich blend of chocolate & brown malts and an excessive amount of the finest chocolate we can source. Expect a medium-bodied beer that has huge notes of milk and baker's chocolate with some light cold brewed coffee on the finish. - 4.21 / 117

item.title: Citra Kong
item.beer_description: Citra Kong is the beast of the jungle, a Double New England IPA packed with ferocious flavor. Double dry hopped with Citra and Nectaron, it unleashes a wild burst of tropical fruit—mango, pineapple, and zesty citrus—through a thick, hazy pour. Its pillowy-soft mouthfeel belies the beastly hop intensity that follows, leaving a roaring finish that echoes like a king in the canopy. Drink with caution—Citra Kong reigns supreme. -
item.beer_style: IPA - Imperial / Double New England / Hazy

item.title: Sous Pression
item.beer_description: Everyone knows, of course, the famous song by Queen and the Starman, David Bowie. Few people know that they were all very close to a certain Sir John who, at the time, was only at the stage of refining his IPA recipes. This beautiful IPA, far from its British counterparts, is typical of big American juices. Hopped with NelSon Sauvin, Nelson Sauvin Cryo, Rakau, Cascade NZ and Hopkief from Southern Cross, it has also been boosted with a nice dose of honey during the boil to add roundness and creaminess to this beautiful hop bomb. So, do like Ziggy and put on your éclair or do like Freddy and don your best mustache and party on! -

item.title: Wet When Slippery (Pineapple & Mango)
item.beer_description: Wet When Slippery DIPA with Pineapple & Mango. -

item.title: Barn Snake
item.beer_description: Once more into the Snake Den with our good friends @district96beer , we have crafted Barn Snake - a creamy, hazy concoction that slithers across your taste buds with flavors of extreme citrus. Strong, punchy notes of tropical passionfruit, grapefruit, lemon and orange from the super combination of Simcoe, Riwaka and Citra. A slight touch of dank earthy funk finishes it off. It’s a triple New England IPA, so sssssssip it sssssslowly… -

item.title: Cosmic Proportions
item.beer_description: We are happy to introduce Cosmic Proportions, a collaboration with Modist Brewing. Cosmic Proportions is our first beer with Omega Yeast's Cosmic Punch yeast, a thiolized strain that features vibrant grapefruit, passion fruit, and guava notes through biotransformation. Cosmic Proportions uses Nelson and Citra in the whirlpool, with a Nelson, Citra, and HBC 586 combination in the dry hop. A hazy yellow pour opens up with aromas of freeze-squeezed OJ, tropical fruit skittles, and lime wedges. Flavors of guava, passionfruit, assorted citrus, mango, green grape, and lime come together in a super pillowy texture with a pop of « EQ juice » and a balanced finish. -
item.beer_style: IPA - Imperial / Double New England / Hazy

item.title: South of Eleven (2025)
item.beer_description: Brewed with Citra, Galaxy, El Dorado, Nectaron & Nelson Sauvin hops - Hoof Hearted Brewing - South of Eleven (2025)

item.title: Orange Party
item.beer_description: This hazy, juice-packed New England IPA was hopped with Citra, Alora, and Superdelic. It bursts with zesty orange and ripe tropical fruit like a cannonball into a glass of fresh juice. Jump in—the party’s just getting started! ? - 4.01 / 20

item.title: One Hunna : Galaxy
item.beer_description: Double IPA - Galaxy - Messorem - One Hunna : Galaxy
item.beer_style: IPA - Imperial / Double New England / Hazy

item.title: Ghost In the Machine (2025)
item.beer_description: Welcome to the future. Our collective human consciousness, or Ghost in the Machine, has gained a tolerance for hops beyond what mankind has ever known before. This double India Pale Ale is the necessary outcome. Brewed with obscene quantities of hand-selected Citra hops from our favorite farm in Yakima Valley, WA. Expect pungent grapefruit aromas and flavors, tropical fruit, and less harsh bitterness than most DIPAs. -
item.beer_style: IPA - Imperial / Double New England / Hazy

item.title: Separation Rage (2025)
item.beer_description: Separation Rage is an 11.9% Hazy Quadruple IPA brewed with oats and hopped with Citra, Mosaic and Galaxy! This Quad version of our beloved Separation Anxiety makes its return after an almost 2 year hiatus and it is drinking incredibly nice! It's soft and tropical with a full body and is completely saturated with notes of nectarine, mango and canned pineapple. -

item.title: Pastry Factory: Pecan Pie
item.beer_description: Rich, indulgent stout with flavors of pecan, maple, and coffee. We used Ethiopian coffee with light roast to let the pecan and maple syrup shine. Blended with three grades of maple syrup, each adding its own depth of sweetness, and toasted pecans for a bold, aromatic finish. This stout is perfectly balanced, with the coffee providing just enough floral notes to complement the rich, nutty profile. Cheers -
